story:
According to Dieter Rams, good design is as little design as possible. In the process of making the Only Clock, award-winning designer Vadim Kibardin was focused on the essential aspects, not burdening his object with redundancy. Back to purity, back to simplicity.

The designer uses this philosophy to create an eye-catching and functional piece of art. Whether on a desk or on a wall, the Only Clock is certain to turn heads.

MEDIA TESTIMONIALS 

“The clock has a futuristic design that is minimalist while presenting the functionality of a timepiece in a new and enticing manner.”  The Trend Hunter

“The ONLY CLOCK rids your day of the unnecessary and strips away the non-essentials to give you a pure and simple view of the time.”  The GadgetFlow

“In fact, it’s so minimal that it doesn’t even need a center or face! The result is an eye-catching, functional piece of art!”  Yanko Design

“If you’ve been finding that analog ticker on your living room wall a little too plain for your urbane digs, this thing should make for quite the modern replacement.”  Coolthings

FEATURED IN

 

FOR MORE THAN 5 YEARS, KIBARDIN HAS BEEN HELPING YOU TO CONTROL YOUR TIME AND ENJOY YOUR LIFE

Kibardin’s clocks and watches are always a unique and innovative way of displaying time. KIBARDIN’s awesome timepieces are the perfect solution, whether you want to use your clock as an eye-catching detail in any interior, or just to display something revolutionary with perfect balance in design and function. We prefer simple shapes, and use materials that are best suited for this purpose. We are proud to present our latest styles of classic contemporary KIBARDIN timepieces.

From a delicate, porcelain tea cup, to an innovative LED wall clock, Kibardin's imaginative creations continue to spearhead innovative and exceptional design. The Only Clock from Vadim Kibardin is a new exercise in aesthetic reductionism. Consider one of these inspiring clock dial designs if you want to make reading the time easier and quicker.

We always work hard to meet your wishes, and use your feedback for new product designs.

YOU CAN BE AN INTEGRAL PART OF OUR SUCCESS

Take part and bring the Only Clock to mass production using the best manufacturing tools, help us develop our plans, and ignite the imagination for bringing to market new futuristic design.

JUST TIME, NOTHING ELSE 

The new KIBARDIN ONLY CLOCK is a Digital wall/desk LED clock with a hollow round face. The frame of the Only Clock displays the hour digits and minute points, crafted in a white or black ABS plastic body.

Be in real time.

The biggest innovation of the Only Clock is that it replicates analog clock mechanisms with digital resources, showing time in completely new way. Each LED in the external circle indicates one minute and lights up for 60 seconds. So naturally, there are 60 LEDs in the internal circle just like there are 60 full minutes in 1 hour, and when the last one lights up, it indicates the actual time period between 7:59 am and 8:00 am. In our video we marked the last LED with 7:60 am.

Day or Night, you will always see the time.

Our Clock shows only one minute point and hour digit in an optimal contrast mode. This means that throughout your dark time, our clock will maintain its day light status, however, you will not be woken up or kept awake by a bright light during the night.

The Only Clock has an alarm function.

This alarm is for those who have trouble waking up in the morning. It literally yanks you out of bed, as you need to wake up and go to the clock in order to turn off the alarm.

Right Angled 90 Degree Jack  

The small DC port found on our Only Clock reverse side is a power socket for a 3.5mm Jack. Our Right Angled 90 Degree Jack lets you use the clock on horizontal and vertical surfaces.

Although cables which have a 3.5mm Jack plug at one end and a standard USB A plug on the other may seem simple and largely indistinguishable from one another, there are differences that make certain cables better than others. Our cable is 5 meters in length and has all the internal qualities that a good cable should have, including tightly-braided wires inside a spiral foil shield. The braided wires help prevent electromagnetic interference and provide structural support, while the foil shield reduces interference.

Install the clock on your wall with the removable hanger.

The mounting hardware is located at the back of the wall clock. The Only Clock construction is created with a place for a special hanger. It has a big keyhole to help find the screw or nail, making hanging the clock easier and keeping it steady and flat.

Install the cords behind your walls.

The standard set contains an AC adapter with a five meter cord. Installing the clock’s cords behind your walls is a great way to extend your home or office without cluttering your floors with a tangle of cables.

Power adapters are essential equipment no matter what country you live in.

Our clock is equipped with one AC adapter with interchangeable plugs for the US, UK, EU, and Korea, covering the whole world.

Maintain the time.

The clock only works with mains electricity, however, a battery should be installed to maintain the time in case of mains power outages.

Special rates on DHL delivery.

United in Success – Every Day. Every Parcel. Both KIBARDIN and DHL understand what it means to start small and grow into a worldwide institution, achieving success through a passion for excellence, innovation and teamwork. We are proud to have DHL as our Official Logistics Partner.

When it comes to design, simplicity is often the best policy. The Only Clock was designed by award-winning designer Vadim Kibardin as a modern 3D interpretation of a traditional analog wall clock.

The material world becomes more complex on the inside and streamlined on the outside. Objects lose their massive material body and turn into contours, imaginatively reminiscent of their purpose. Modern technologies allow placing electronics inside the product housing in such a way as needed to turn it into a logically and conceptually sound frame-like symbol. I’ve been using frame technologies in concept designs and my own products for more than 10 years. In 2000 I first published the “Q-time” wristwatch concept, which later was used as a prop in the A. Zeldovich movie “Mischen” (“The Target”). 2009 saw the introduction of the “Sputnik watch” concept. And the White and White Clock started off in 2009 as an ambitious-concept Black and White Clock using individual OLED components, and a production-ready model in a white case was released to the public in 2011. The White & White Clock has drawn a lot of attention from fellow designers and the general public. The Only Clock is the next step in the evolution of time devices and is based on my research in the field of «framework technologies».

Completely silent and precise – the world’s first mass produced frame clock. An expressive image and charismatic character make this clock recognizable and turn it into the highlight of any interior, while its non-compromising quality ensures many years of reliable service. Treat yourself or your loved ones to a gift of time and memories.

The size of the clock is tailored to medium-sized interiors. The clock measures 300mm in the outer diameter, which ensures comfortable time reading from up to 8 meters. A clock this size can be placed on the shelf or on the wall, in groups or alone, in residential as well as office spaces. The room’s interior can be any style, since the clock does not feature any prominent massive housing or a traditional clock face. The clock literally ‘passes’ the environment through itself, dissolves it, and at the same time fulfills its function and projects the symbolic image of eternally flowing time. Round and round, day after day, not skipping one second.

This is the clean style of the clock’s housing - there’s nothing superfluous, nothing redundant, the surfaces gently curve and flow around the internal components, while providing the clock with stable footing for placement on horizontal surfaces. A wall mount is provided, allowing you to reliably attach the clock parallel to the wall axis.

The 90° rotatable DC jack allows for consistently convenient and reliable plug insertion in both horizontal and vertical positions. Note though, that a clock with this amount of white LEDs cannot be powered by batteries. Using the adapter and the separate 5-meter power cord you can display the clock in a place of your choosing, and power it from the nearest outlet.

Two control buttons are positioned inside the window, not visible at first glance, but always accessible from the front. These provide a convenient way of interfacing with the clock. You won’t experience any difficulty setting the time or managing your alarm.

Located next to the control buttons are the sound holes for the alarm. The only thing you’ll need to do is turn off this loud ringing - as fast as possible!

The clock is encased in a matte black-and-white housing with matte light-grey and dark-grey light-dispersing screens. The digits show the current hour. The current minute is shown by the glowing segment on the minute circle. The Only Clock allows you to see the precise time in a familiar, intuitive manner, the same way it is seen on common analog clocks with hands. This method is familiar to everybody - nothing is easier, there are no puzzles of any kind. The white LED color is not incidental – it blends harmoniously with overall black and white color scheme. Due to the contrasting colors you can easily read the precise time in any lightning conditions, but it won’t bother you during the nighttime or impede falling asleep.

The box contains the clock, a detachable 5-meter power cord with USB connector for mains connection on one side and a DC jack for clock connection on the other, a universal power adapter supporting all mains types, and a special plug matching the power outlets in the region of intended usage. There’s a choice of UK, SAA, EU, and US plugs for use in United States, Canada, Europe, Middle East, South America, Asia, The Caribbean, Great Britain, Ireland, Africa, Hong Kong, Singapore, Australia, Fiji, New Zealand, China, Japan, France, and more than 150 countries. Also included are the instructions, the 2 year warranty card, and a troubleshooting manual to help you find the solution to any non-standard situation and restore the clock to its normal functioning mode. Everything is packaged inside a gift box with soft padding that reliably holds all contents inside the box and protects them from any potential damage.

The clock only works with mains electricity!

Specification

  • Model:                                                  Desk/Wall Digital LED Clock
  • Design:                                                 Vadim Kibardin 2015
  • Year of Release:                                 2016
  • Item Number:                                     K-OC-WW-5m, K-OC-BB-5m, K-OC-WB-5m
  • Cord Length:                                       5m
  • Functions:                                            Time, Alarm
  • Power Supply:                                    Universal AC Adapter, input 100-240V, output DC5V
  • Battery:                                                CR2032
  • Case material:                                     ABS Plastic
  • Color:                                                     White LED in White or Black Case
  • Dimensions:                                         W300mm x D50mm x H300mm
  • Weight:                                                 450g
  • Package Size:                                     W340mm x D350mm x H70mm
  • Weight (incl. package):                     900g
  • Weight (incl. post package):            1,500g
  • Manufacturing:                                    Czech Republic
  • Warranty:                                              2 Years

08.18.2016 - That's how the Only Clock looks from the inside.

08.20.2016 - Become one of the first 200 backers and get the Only Clock for $159!

08.21.2016 - As a result we have a product that is ready for manufacture at volume and on schedule.

08.22.2016 - Another sunny Monday, another chance to support our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign for The Only Clock.

The full retail price for the Kibardin Only Clock will be $229, so you're getting a real deal by supporting us right now. We will not be selling the Kibardin Only Clock through retail outlets until all your rewards have been shipped.


Get $15 each time one of your friends buys the Only Clock using your personal URL. This means that you could earn your Clock for free when their order ships!

Here’s how:

1.            Login on to your Indiegogo account.

2.            Go to our campaign page, and click on the link button as shown in the picture below.

3.            There you will see your personalized URL link, which should look as follows with your unique 8-digit number: https://igg.me/at/the-only-clock/x/nnnnnnnn (nnn'ns are your unique number.)

4.            Share your personalized link with your friends and family on your social media accounts and via email and let them know that they get a 15% discount code for goods in the KIBARDIN eshop when they purchase the Only Clock using your link during the campaign on Indiegogo.

How To Track Your Referrals:

1.            Log into your Indiegogo account.

2.            Click on your user name on the top right of the page.

3.            Select the “My Profile” option.

4.            Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of Referrals and Contributions.

5.            Referral cash payments will be disbursed before shipping begins, and credits can be redeemed in the Only Clock companion app.

Help us by sharing the Kibardin Only Clock with your friends!  Know someone who would be just as stoked as you about the Kibardin Only Clock? Share our campaign with them, see more photos, and follow our progress on our social media pages:

How do I choose my colour and dial design?

You will be emailed a survey to your inbox via Backerkit at the end of the campaign, within 7 days of the campaign ending.

Taxes.

Overseas orders may be subject to additional import duties and taxes, which are levied once a shipment reaches its destination country. We have no control over additional customs charges and as such, these charges are to be borne and paid by the purchaser.

Delivery Date.

The estimated shipping date for the Only Clock is 10 December 2016. If there are any changes to the expected shipping date of your order we will contact you via your email address.

How will my order be shipped? Delivery Method.

We only use DHL couriers for our Only Clock deliveries, and highly recommend them to anyone who requires fast and tracked door-to-door pickup right across the whole world. You will be notified and provided with the parcel tracking number as soon as your order is shipped out. Visit www.dhl.com for more information about DHL’s courier shipping method.

How much is shipping?

Here are the shipping and handling details for locations around the world:

USA, Canada, UK: $35, EU: $25, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Singapore, Japan, China, South Korea, Indonesia, Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand, Australia, New Zealand: $42. Russia: $65. The rest of the world: $55.

If you have a specific question about shipping or handling, please don’t hesitate to contact us at info@kibardindesign.com

Which countries do you ship to? International Backers.

We're proud to have KIBARDIN fans in over 100 countries. We will ship Kibardin Only Clocks worldwide, with the exception of Iran, Iraq, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region.

Quality Certified.

KIBARDIN Only Clocks will pass performance and quality assurance tests in order to meet the necessary local, national, and international quality standards relevant to a particular market or product set. Declarations of Conformity and Safety Certificates for Only Clocks and their adapters are available as required.

Risks and Challenges.

Any new venture or innovation includes an element of risk, and ours is no different. Having successfully fulfilled our previous campaign on our own web-site, we have learned quite a few things. We encountered two main problems – logistics and supplier quality control – and we took steps to ensure both were quickly resolved. On the production side, the flow is now well established after having put our key supplier through its paces, and our white-gloved quality inspection team has been inspecting each and every clock in our subsequent orders. We can still bump into new challenges in unexpected places. But we know from our experience that we always ensure successful results.

Global shipping also has a way of delivering surprises, from port of entry strikes to customs delays. Our delivery dates, as outlined in the campaign, are based on careful planning and our manufacturing experience, but may be subject to change. We will make sure to keep each of our supporters fully updated.

Warranty and Return Policy.

Kibardin Only Clocks are guaranteed against defects in materials and workmanship for a full 24 months from the date of purchase (proof of purchase is necessary). If a product ever fails due to a manufacturing defect, even after extended use, we will at our discretion either repair the product without charge or replace it. Your satisfaction is our goal. If you would like to return the clock or exchange it for a different item, please contact us by email at info@kibardindesign.com within 48 hours of receiving your order. We will email you a replace/return document and request that you kindly complete and enclose this in the package, and pack the item in the original packing and manner with which it was received. You may return or exchange it within 7 days of delivery.

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@kibardindesign.com

P +420 774 100 500
Monday to Friday
Hours: 10 a.m.-5 p.m. Czech local time
story_txt:
According to Dieter Rams, good design is as little design as possible. In the process of making the Only Clock, award-winning designer Vadim Kibardin was focused on the essential aspects, not burdening his object with redundancy. Back to purity, back to simplicity.The designer uses this philosophy to create an eye-catching and functional piece of art. Whether on a desk or on a wall, the Only Clock is certain to turn heads.MEDIA TESTIMONIALS  “The clock has a futuristic design that is minimalist while presenting the functionality of a timepiece in a new and enticing manner.”  The Trend Hunter“The ONLY CLOCK rids your day of the unnecessary and strips away the non-essentials to give you a pure and simple view of the time.”  The GadgetFlow“In fact, it’s so minimal that it doesn’t even need a center or face! The result is an eye-catching, functional piece of art!”  Yanko Design“If you’ve been finding that analog ticker on your living room wall a little too plain for your urbane digs, this thing should make for quite the modern replacement.”  CoolthingsFEATURED IN FOR MORE THAN 5 YEARS, KIBARDIN HAS BEEN HELPING YOU TO CONTROL YOUR TIME AND ENJOY YOUR LIFEKibardin’s clocks and watches are always a unique and innovative way of displaying time. KIBARDIN’s awesome timepieces are the perfect solution, whether you want to use your clock as an eye-catching detail in any interior, or just to display something revolutionary with perfect balance in design and function. We prefer simple shapes, and use materials that are best suited for this purpose. We are proud to present our latest styles of classic contemporary KIBARDIN timepieces.From a delicate, porcelain tea cup, to an innovative LED wall clock, Kibardin's imaginative creations continue to spearhead innovative and exceptional design. The Only Clock from Vadim Kibardin is a new exercise in aesthetic reductionism. Consider one of these inspiring clock dial designs if you want to make reading the time easier and quicker.We always work hard to meet your wishes, and use your feedback for new product designs.YOU CAN BE AN INTEGRAL PART OF OUR SUCCESS Take part and bring the Only Clock to mass production using the best manufacturing tools, help us develop our plans, and ignite the imagination for bringing to market new futuristic design.JUST TIME, NOTHING ELSE  The new KIBARDIN ONLY CLOCK is a Digital wall/desk LED clock with a hollow round face. The frame of the Only Clock displays the hour digits and minute points, crafted in a white or black ABS plastic body.Be in real time. The biggest innovation of the Only Clock is that it replicates analog clock mechanisms with digital resources, showing time in completely new way. Each LED in the external circle indicates one minute and lights up for 60 seconds. So naturally, there are 60 LEDs in the internal circle just like there are 60 full minutes in 1 hour, and when the last one lights up, it indicates the actual time period between 7:59 am and 8:00 am. In our video we marked the last LED with 7:60 am.Day or Night, you will always see the time. Our Clock shows only one minute point and hour digit in an optimal contrast mode. This means that throughout your dark time, our clock will maintain its day light status, however, you will not be woken up or kept awake by a bright light during the night.The Only Clock has an alarm function. This alarm is for those who have trouble waking up in the morning. It literally yanks you out of bed, as you need to wake up and go to the clock in order to turn off the alarm.Right Angled 90 Degree Jack  The small DC port found on our Only Clock reverse side is a power socket for a 3.5mm Jack. Our Right Angled 90 Degree Jack lets you use the clock on horizontal and vertical surfaces.Although cables which have a 3.5mm Jack plug at one end and a standard USB A plug on the other may seem simple and largely indistinguishable from one another, there are differences that make certain cables better than others. Our cable is 5 meters in length and has all the internal qualities that a good cable should have, including tightly-braided wires inside a spiral foil shield. The braided wires help prevent electromagnetic interference and provide structural support, while the foil shield reduces interference.Install the clock on your wall with the removable hanger.The mounting hardware is located at the back of the wall clock. The Only Clock construction is created with a place for a special hanger. It has a big keyhole to help find the screw or nail, making hanging the clock easier and keeping it steady and flat.Install the cords behind your walls. The standard set contains an AC adapter with a five meter cord. Installing the clock’s cords behind your walls is a great way to extend your home or office without cluttering your floors with a tangle of cables.Power adapters are essential equipment no matter what country you live in. Our clock is equipped with one AC adapter with interchangeable plugs for the US, UK, EU, and Korea, covering the whole world.Maintain the time.The clock only works with mains electricity, however, a battery should be installed to maintain the time in case of mains power outages.Special rates on DHL delivery.United in Success – Every Day. Every Parcel. Both KIBARDIN and DHL understand what it means to start small and grow into a worldwide institution, achieving success through a passion for excellence, innovation and teamwork. We are proud to have DHL as our Official Logistics Partner.When it comes to design, simplicity is often the best policy. The Only Clock was designed by award-winning designer Vadim Kibardin as a modern 3D interpretation of a traditional analog wall clock.The material world becomes more complex on the inside and streamlined on the outside. Objects lose their massive material body and turn into contours, imaginatively reminiscent of their purpose. Modern technologies allow placing electronics inside the product housing in such a way as needed to turn it into a logically and conceptually sound frame-like symbol. I’ve been using frame technologies in concept designs and my own products for more than 10 years. In 2000 I first published the “Q-time” wristwatch concept, which later was used as a prop in the A. Zeldovich movie “Mischen” (“The Target”). 2009 saw the introduction of the “Sputnik watch” concept. And the White and White Clock started off in 2009 as an ambitious-concept Black and White Clock using individual OLED components, and a production-ready model in a white case was released to the public in 2011. The White & White Clock has drawn a lot of attention from fellow designers and the general public. The Only Clock is the next step in the evolution of time devices and is based on my research in the field of «framework technologies».Completely silent and precise – the world’s first mass produced frame clock. An expressive image and charismatic character make this clock recognizable and turn it into the highlight of any interior, while its non-compromising quality ensures many years of reliable service. Treat yourself or your loved ones to a gift of time and memories.The size of the clock is tailored to medium-sized interiors. The clock measures 300mm in the outer diameter, which ensures comfortable time reading from up to 8 meters. A clock this size can be placed on the shelf or on the wall, in groups or alone, in residential as well as office spaces. The room’s interior can be any style, since the clock does not feature any prominent massive housing or a traditional clock face. The clock literally ‘passes’ the environment through itself, dissolves it, and at the same time fulfills its function and projects the symbolic image of eternally flowing time. Round and round, day after day, not skipping one second.This is the clean style of the clock’s housing - there’s nothing superfluous, nothing redundant, the surfaces gently curve and flow around the internal components, while providing the clock with stable footing for placement on horizontal surfaces. A wall mount is provided, allowing you to reliably attach the clock parallel to the wall axis.The 90° rotatable DC jack allows for consistently convenient and reliable plug insertion in both horizontal and vertical positions. Note though, that a clock with this amount of white LEDs cannot be powered by batteries. Using the adapter and the separate 5-meter power cord you can display the clock in a place of your choosing, and power it from the nearest outlet.Two control buttons are positioned inside the window, not visible at first glance, but always accessible from the front. These provide a convenient way of interfacing with the clock. You won’t experience any difficulty setting the time or managing your alarm.Located next to the control buttons are the sound holes for the alarm. The only thing you’ll need to do is turn off this loud ringing - as fast as possible!The clock is encased in a matte black-and-white housing with matte light-grey and dark-grey light-dispersing screens. The digits show the current hour. The current minute is shown by the glowing segment on the minute circle. The Only Clock allows you to see the precise time in a familiar, intuitive manner, the same way it is seen on common analog clocks with hands. This method is familiar to everybody - nothing is easier, there are no puzzles of any kind. The white LED color is not incidental – it blends harmoniously with overall black and white color scheme. Due to the contrasting colors you can easily read the precise time in any lightning conditions, but it won’t bother you during the nighttime or impede falling asleep.The box contains the clock, a detachable 5-meter power cord with USB connector for mains connection on one side and a DC jack for clock connection on the other, a universal power adapter supporting all mains types, and a special plug matching the power outlets in the region of intended usage. There’s a choice of UK, SAA, EU, and US plugs for use in United States, Canada, Europe, Middle East, South America, Asia, The Caribbean, Great Britain, Ireland, Africa, Hong Kong, Singapore, Australia, Fiji, New Zealand, China, Japan, France, and more than 150 countries. Also included are the instructions, the 2 year warranty card, and a troubleshooting manual to help you find the solution to any non-standard situation and restore the clock to its normal functioning mode. Everything is packaged inside a gift box with soft padding that reliably holds all contents inside the box and protects them from any potential damage.The clock only works with mains electricity!Specification
Model:                                                  Desk/Wall Digital LED Clock
Design:                                                 Vadim Kibardin 2015
Year of Release:                                 2016
Item Number:                                     K-OC-WW-5m, K-OC-BB-5m, K-OC-WB-5m
Cord Length:                                       5m
Functions:                                            Time, Alarm
Power Supply:                                    Universal AC Adapter, input 100-240V, output DC5V
Battery:                                                CR2032
Case material:                                     ABS Plastic
Color:                                                     White LED in White or Black Case
Dimensions:                                         W300mm x D50mm x H300mm
Weight:                                                 450g
Package Size:                                     W340mm x D350mm x H70mm
Weight (incl. package):                     900g
Weight (incl. post package):            1,500g
Manufacturing:                                    Czech Republic
Warranty:                                              2 Years

story:
The video will show my situation; but here's the quick breakdown for the campaign:


Problem: I am operating 2 businesses(art production/framing and a reclaimed material, home furnishings production outfit) from a 1 bedroom studio. My construction of objects and canvas frames is in the basement, art studio is in my bedroom, and my furnishings outfit is in the living room - leaving the kitchen and closets and hallway for storage!

PLUS: My business is booming! I need to also hire assistants, but I have no where to bring them to work.

Solution: A warehouse that is just down the street has become available to me! It has a loading dock, 2 garage doors (for all my large scale work and equipment), and is adjacent to a main street with access to business 85! This will become, not only my place for storage, production and future expansion; but also for other opportunities to lease out for music/film/video, photography, events, and gallery showings, etc.!

I am asking you to assist me in a trial period of 7-8 months (through the winter, as well) to get my roots established, and I will take it from there. I am hoping that, as this campaign runs its duration, that each month's need is raised so I can extend my stay for the trial period.

Again, the video will pretty much define the "what" and the "why" for my campaign...and why I need you. It's simple. If I raise the funds, I move on to expand these businesses into the local economy with job creation and inspiration to the creative community around us.

So enjoy the video and please consider if and how much you can assist this vision. Thank you and blessings!

Brian

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


CAMPAIGN UPDATE...


Even though I have not yet raised the funds to get this for the full year, I had enough positive response that I felt it necessary to at least try! So, I got it - for a few weeks, anyways. Hoping and trusting for the funds to trickle in as I continue to expand the vision and set up shop. Here's to seeing what the Lord will do!

But please continue to support the vision and the need. Thank you ALL!!!!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
Who We Are

In Summer 2016, our organization has the opportunity to be a part of the largest traveling music festival, Vans Warped Tour. This festival contains our primary target demographic (Ages 13-19) and primary stakeholders (Musicians and Bands of diverse genres). We will become a vendor, travel nationally and internationally, and spread our mission and the importance of volunteerism. Additionally, we will host and organize community outreaches for teens and musicians during the tour.

Vans Warped Tour dates are: mid June-August 2016 Throughout the course of these dates, we will have the opportunity to spread our message to over 500,000 attendees and volunteer in more than 40 cities!



Skully Serves is dedicated to promoting volunteerism and encouraging teenagers and young adults to become actively involved in their community.

We provide engaging, informative, and meaningful outreach opportunities. Through local outreaches and service learning, we connect teens with their favorite musical artists by volunteering, service learning, and working together.

Since April 2015, we have had monthly community outreaches that promote volunteerism, inclusiveness, and community involvement in the Los Angeles area and will be spearheading our first Richmond, VA outreach in December 2015. We will be organizing monthly outreaches in both areas and are quickly expanding to the Pacific Northwest region. Our outreaches have benefited a variety of significant causes, such as: environmental clean-up, helping children with disabilities during their swim sessions, assembling care packages for the military, caring for rescued animals, and much more. 



Skully Serves: What We Need 

To complete this effort, we are in need of $15,000 to travel the entire duration of Vans Warped Tour 2016. This covers all travel expenses for the organization, premium social media promotion, catering, and secures our booth spot for the entire duration of Vans Warped Tour 2016.

 Craig Owens of rock band Chiodos

 Josh Scogin of rock band '68


The Impact

With raised funds, we will be able to reach teens across the nation and more importantly be able to promote our cause and serve others together. The benefits of volunteering are countless and life-changing. By donating to our cause, you are not only supporting our mission, but also helping us to demonstrate social responsibility, positivity, and a passion for helping others.


Moreover, we want to show teens that volunteering is enjoyable and more so important for our well-being. Our wish is that the music scene will embrace this movement and that artists will do their part by helping to raise awareness as well as volunteering in the community outreaches.

We want the work of Skully Serves to strike an active chord within our young people. Rather than passively sympathize with a problem or cause, teenagers will find a solution and take action. We want to instill the importance of volunteerism into the forefront of teenagers' minds where they feel absolutely compelled, responsible, and eager to maintain an active role in their community.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to donate money, no worries. There are many ways you can help:
  • Direct your friends to our website www.SkullyServes.com
  • Find us on social media and follow us! We follow back! We're on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter! Share our pages and we'll love you foreverrrr <3
  • When you Tweet, Instagram or Facebook use the hashtag: #SkullyServes
  • Share this Indiegogo Campaign with your Friends, Parents, Investors, or anyone that may be interested in what we're doing! Word of Mouth goes a long way!

story:
TOCA: 20 Years of Tradition and Innovation

Since 1996, Tohono O'odham Community Action (TOCA) has drawn upon the O'odham Himdag (Lifeways of the Desert People) to create innovative and effective solutions for our community. Despite the many challenges faced by the Tohono O'odham Nation – poverty, epidemic rates of diabetes, cultural decline – TOCA has created hope and change. We are making a real difference in the lives of individuals, families and our community.

  • TOCA has redeveloped a tribal food system that support wellness, economic development and  food sovereignty in our community – TOCA has operated two farms, a beginning farmer training programs, a traditional foods cafe, school foods programing, wild food harvesting, community gardens, and much more.
  • TOCA has revitalized Tohono O'odham arts & culture – Our basketweavers cooperative, Desert Rain Gallery, summer arts and culture programs, traditional games festivals and countless other programs are revitalizing the O'odham Himdag for this and future generations
  • TOCA has empowered individuals, families and our community to create positive change – TOCA uses an empowerment model to help youth, adults and elders develop the vision, skills and resources bring about systems change within our community. 
  • TOCA been recognized as one of the most effective and innovative nonprofits in Indian Country – TOCA has received countless awards – from the President's Council on the Arts and Humanities to the Ford Foundation's Leadership for a Changing World program, from Indian Health Service to WhyHunger. We have received funding from countless Federal and state agencies, private foundations, and individuals, all of whom recognize TOCA's creativity and effectiveness.

We have made a huge difference in our community, but we need your help to keep moving forward.

Celebrate 20 Years of TOCA by Making 20 More Years Possible

In order to build upon our success and to create a healthy, culturally vital and sustainable Tohono O'odham community, we need your help. Please make a generous contribution to the TOCA at 20 Fund. Your support will allow us to continue and expand our work to create food sovereignty and cultural vitality on the Tohono O'odham Nation.

Here to Stay: The Next 20 Years

Our work is not always easy. Over 20 years, TOCA has experienced times of plenty and times in which we had nothing. Through it all, however, we have kept going. Why? Because we are community members who strive to make a difference. We have no choice. Our work is about our grandparents and our children. Unlike so many programs that close their doors when a grant ends, we have kept going through think and thin. We are here to stay. But with your help, we can continue to have a profound impact on the future of the Tohono O'odham community.

Spread to Word

Please share our TOCA Turns 20 Campaign with your friends, family and colleagues.

  • Get the word out on Facebook, Twitter and other social media.
  • Challenge them to match your gift!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to get others involved.

Thank you for helping make sure that the next 20 years are as inspiring and effective as the last 20 have been.
story_txt:
TOCA: 20 Years of Tradition and Innovation
Since 1996, Tohono O'odham Community Action (TOCA) has drawn upon the O'odham Himdag (Lifeways of the Desert People) to create innovative and effective solutions for our community. Despite the many challenges faced by the Tohono O'odham Nation – poverty, epidemic rates of diabetes, cultural decline – TOCA has created hope and change. We are making a real difference in the lives of individuals, families and our community.


TOCA has redeveloped a tribal food system that support wellness, economic development and  food sovereignty in our community – TOCA has operated two farms, a beginning farmer training programs, a traditional foods cafe, school foods programing, wild food harvesting, community gardens, and much more.

TOCA has revitalized Tohono O'odham arts & culture – Our basketweavers cooperative, Desert Rain Gallery, summer arts and culture programs, traditional games festivals and countless other programs are revitalizing the O'odham Himdag for this and future generations

TOCA has empowered individuals, families and our community to create positive change – TOCA uses an empowerment model to help youth, adults and elders develop the vision, skills and resources bring about systems change within our community. 

TOCA been recognized as one of the most effective and innovative nonprofits in Indian Country – TOCA has received countless awards – from the President's Council on the Arts and Humanities to the Ford Foundation's Leadership for a Changing World program, from Indian Health Service to WhyHunger. We have received funding from countless Federal and state agencies, private foundations, and individuals, all of whom recognize TOCA's creativity and effectiveness.

We have made a huge difference in our community, but we need your help to keep moving forward.   Celebrate 20 Years of TOCA by Making 20 More Years Possible In order to build upon our success and to create a healthy, culturally vital and sustainable Tohono O'odham community, we need your help. Please make a generous contribution to the TOCA at 20 Fund. Your support will allow us to continue and expand our work to create food sovereignty and cultural vitality on the Tohono O'odham Nation.

    Here to Stay: The Next 20 Years

Our work is not always easy. Over 20 years, TOCA has experienced times of plenty and times in which we had nothing. Through it all, however, we have kept going. Why? Because we are community members who strive to make a difference. We have no choice. Our work is about our grandparents and our children. Unlike so many programs that close their doors when a grant ends, we have kept going through think and thin. We are here to stay. But with your help, we can continue to have a profound impact on the future of the Tohono O'odham community.

    Spread to Word

Please share our TOCA Turns 20 Campaign with your friends, family and colleagues.
  Get the word out on Facebook, Twitter and other social media. Challenge them to match your gift!
Use the Indiegogo share tools to get others involved.   Thank you for helping make sure that the next 20 years are as inspiring and effective as the last 20 have been.

story:
Rencontre entre passion , frisson et prévention


Salut a tous, je suis un jeune motard qui a toujours voulu succomber a l'envie de faire le fou en faisant des cascades, mais il ne m'a pas fallu longtemps pour me rendre compte que cela n'était pas inné chez tout le monde.Pour cela j'ai du me blesser avant de me calmer, mais la passion est encore la. De la m'est venu une idée ...  C'est lors de puce moto que j'ai découvert cette machine,et que j'ai pu l'essayer.J'ai tout de suite vu le potentiel puisqu'on accède aux sensations en étant en sécurité.Avec les mises en circonstances et un discours appropriés cela pourrait être un formidable outils de prévention chez les jeunes et tout autres publics concernés .

  • Mon but est de faire le tour des collèges,lycées en faisant des démonstrations,essais,débats autour de la sécurité routière,les dangers de la moto en passant un bon moment. 
  • Ce projet est important parce qu'il permet de canalisé les impulsions qu'on peut avoir sur la route en étant jeunes ou moins jeunes bien sur.Vaut mieux se rendre compte tôt que faire le fou n'est pas un jeu .
  • Plus tôt et plus vite nous pourrons sensibiliser un large public, ce sera grâce a vous et votre gentillesse. 
  • Cette pédagogie est nécessaires pour un grand nombres qui s'adonnent aux cascades sur route sans se soucier des conséquences et sa dès le plus jeune age.Ciblé leur attention est une nécessité pour pour que leurs vies de chauffeur soit la plus saine possible.


Ce qui me motive a faire cette campagne 


  • J'ai lancé cette campagne pour mettre en place la logistique de déplacement,les supports pédagogiques tels que vidéos, dépliants,documents divers et surtout le montage de la machine .
  • En contrepartie unique vous aurez accès a toutes la documentation,les vidéos et la priorités pour une intervention dans votre secteur. 
  • Si je n'atteint pas mon objectif,je continuerais a développer ma machine et mon projet avec les fonds levés


L'impact sur le public a long terme


  • Cette machine permet de réaliser des cascades en sécurité en mettant face aux difficultés et aux obstacles rencontrés .Elle évite ainsi de se confronter aux mêmes problèmes sur la route et dans notre conduite de tous les jours.
  • Moi même j'ai pris conscience qu'après mettre blesser,mais après un tour sur cette machine j'ai fais face a des difficultés qui aurait pu être catastrophiques si cela avait étais dans des conditions réelles.
  • Rendez ce projet concret  l'information, la simulation et la prévention sont les meilleurs outils pour nous aider a faire passer le message.


D'autres façons d'aider


Certaines personnes ne peuvent pas contribuer mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

  • Demandez aux gens de passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de ce projet.
  • Rappelez-leur d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo !

story:
Short Summary

Here are some of the current (serious) issues that must be addressed:

  • Revert back to a communal way of living (Ubuntu style)
  • Free off-grid energy for the community projects (Solar and Wind)
  • Production of food for the community. Surplus food will go to the needy or be sold if money is required 
  • Demonstrate to people and the rest of the world that this type of community lifestyle is the ONLY way forward, if we are going to survive on this planet
  • Offer sound advice and help others to start similar community projects

We are located on the Southern Tip of Africa and the local inhabitants to this area were living this way 200-250 years ago, and HAPPY. Now there is misery and suffering and it needn't be that way.

What We Need 

We have a small plot (paid for and secured) on the edge of a mountain range, that can easily house 3-4 families. There is a natural spring that runs out of the mountain, offering clean water.


What we need is:

  • To build earthen buildings, as housing
  • To construct earthen structures, for communal living. (cooking, socializing spaces etc.)
  • Off-grid, free energy (Solar, Wind)
  • To setup projects for food production. Square foot gardening and aquaponics
  • Practical landscaping design and implementation. Herbs (healing plants) and indigenous vegetation
  • To include art and music workshop for the community and people outside of the community
  • To include all people that have been failed by the system. (autism, spectrum children and others that have been made to feel inadequate)


What You Get

What we will achieve:
  • A proper functioning community based lifestyle model
  • Communication and interaction between youth and elders
  • Re connection to the natural way of living in harmony with nature
  • Onsite art and music projects
  • A daily update of activities and progression of the project, via social media and website

The Impact

  • DEMONSTRATE to the world that community lifestyle is the ONLY way forward, as opposed to a competitive lifestyle
  • DEMONSTRATE that NOBODY goes hungry in an caring community
  • DEMONSTRATE the model to the world that can easily be copied on any scale.
  • Positive impact for all human beings on earth, regardless of financial or mental status
  • Living within the laws of nature
  • Massive increase in community spirit  (through positive energy)

Challenges

Possible challenges:

  • Dealing with current system and its laws
  • Implementation and acceptance of natural laws
  • Educating people towards living self-sufficianctly

Other Ways You Can Help

It is not always possible for like-minded people to contribute financially, but there are always other means of helping  
  • please get word out and make some noise about this initiative
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools and any other communication methods that are available to you

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Summary
  My name is Dee Henderson. I have a dream to own and operate a unique Bed & Breakfast. I want each room to have a different theme. I love people, and love making sure that they are taken care of. Raising the funding for this project will enable me to fulfil this dream. It will be a lot of hard work, but I am ready and committed to seeing this dream become my reality. I believe in hard work, and I'm not afraid to do whatever is necessary to make this business successful. With my history in customer service, I know I can make this work. Help me make my dream come true!

What We Need & What You Get

I need $400,000 in total. This will allow me to purchase the property and acquire all the business licensure, remodel each existing room and decorate in specific themes, fence the property, buy all the supplies to get started, ensure that the indoor pool and hot tub are in good working order, and obtain appliances that will handle the extra workload.

If I don't obtain the whole $400,000 I need, I will use what money I do get to make a sizeable down payment on the property, and I will do all the rest of the work myself, however slowly I must do it. That's how committed I am to making this my reality. No matter what, I plan to succeed. Thankfully, with your generosity, it will happen this year! 

The Impact

There can never be too many unique lodging options. People travel for many different reasons, to many places in the world - some people even travel just to stay in unique places. This campaign is an opportunity for you to be a part of something unique. I will never forget the help I receive here, and will do my part to pay it foward as well.

Risks & Challenges

Any new business has obstacles. My biggest obstacle will be getting the word out about my business. This can be easily overcome with advertising in the right places. I plan to have a professional website, and many ads in travel and business magazines.

I'm also an author, and do have a small income from that. I will be able to keep the place going until business catches on, and it can support itself. I will not draw an income until the business is making a good profit.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help financially, I would still ask that you help by spreading the word! Share my campaign everywhere, and help me make my dream come true! I am also willing to help others in whatever way I can to see that their dreams come true. Let's help each other!

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone. My name is Jennifer Roden, local anime lover, gamer, and K-pop obsessed cosplayer. I am an up and coming entrepreneur with over five years of retail and customer service experience, three years of management experience, and one year of financial experience under my belt. My husband, Michael Roden (also known as Deadpool), has about ten years of management experience under his belt. Together, we make a pretty good team.

 For years if I wanted something anime or kawaii related and didn't want to shop online, Dallas, TX was my go to place. Unfortunately, driving six hours round trip isn't practical and can become expensive. But what else was there for me to do when there has never been a store locally that specializes in just those things. Well, I am here to change that!

My goal is to open a mobile business locally that specializes in anime and kawaii merchandise at a reasonable price. This campaign is important to me because it affects a large group in Shreveport-Bossier City with myself included. I want to "complete" the geek scene here by having a store that caters to the otaku community.

With your help as a contributor we can make this dream into a reality. A reality where you can shop at a local store for an item that you normally would either have to travel for, shop online for, or wait for a convention to purchase. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to reach $18,500. This amount will be used to purchase:
  • start up inventory
  • fixtures and shelving
  • renovations for the cargo trailer (including detail work, lighting, insulation, and a cooling/heating unit)
  • generator for the trailer
  • manufacturing cost of the perks
  • plus Deadpool needs a hot tub  No, he doesn't.
All money raised over the campaign goal will be used to purchase a guaranteed lot to place my business on!
PERKS
The perks we are offering range from $1.00 to $5,000!
*$1.00- You have our thanks and gratitude!
*$5.00- We will display our personal thanks on social media!
*$10.00- You will receive a Indiegogo exclusive button promoting that you are a Kawaii Pop Supporter!
*$25.00- You will receive a button, keychain, and fridge magnet.
*$50.00- You will will receive a button and a choice between a T-shirt and a tote bag.
*$100.00- You will receive the $25 perk, a T-shirt, and a mystery kawaii item!
*$250.00- You will receive the $100 perk, and an exclusive hoodie. As an added bonus, you will also receive an alternate color tote bag that will give you 10% off any items you can fit inside for an entire year! This perk works in store and at our convention booths!
*$250.00- You will receive the $100 perk and have your name or company logo on our trailer for 3 months!
*$500.00- You will receive the $250 perk as well as a private shopping experience before my grand opening for you and five lucky guests! This also includes a 10% discount on all purchases made during this event! *Must be located within the Shreveport-Bossier City area.*
*$500.00- We will put your name or company logo on our trailer for 6 months!
*$1,000.00- This perk is limited to 5 people and for good reason! Have you ever wanted a store mascot based on a character you designed? Well, now is your chance! With the purchase of this perk, you will get to design a mascot that will be drawn by our logo designer and receive a T-shirt featuring your mascot! That's not all! You will also be able to see your mascot on our trailer standing next to Arisu!
*$1,000.00- We will put your name or company logo on our trailer for a whole year!
*$5,000.00- Your name or company logo will be permanently on our trailer!
Our campaign is "fixed funding". This means that if we do not reach our goal then the money will be returned to you. We won't keep any money funded to us if we do not reach our goal. This is to ensure that our contributors have the utmost trust in us. This also means that if the campaign fails, we will not be giving out any perks.

Why a Mobile Business?

Now, I know what you're thinking. A mobile business? Why would I do that? Wouldn't a normal brick and mortar business be better? Lets face it. Rent on a building in a decent neighborhood is over $1,000 a month and that doesn't include utilities or insurance. Even with buying my items at a decent wholesale rate, in order to make rent then my prices would have to rise. I don't like the idea of doing that since I'm the type of woman that loves sales.
By having a mobile business, I have more areas that I can open up shop. I won't be tied down to one specific area. My overhead will be low since I will essentially own my building. My overhead being low means that my prices can stay low while still making a profit. It will be a win-win for everyone!

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that times are tough, and it's hard to make ends meet much less donate to a campaign. Even if you can't contribute to the campaign, you can still help by "liking" and sharing our facebook page or sharing the campaign to others using the Indiegogo sharing tools. 
As an added incentive, the person that brings in the most money through referrals will receive a $100 store credit to be used in store or at our convention booths! Make sure that you are logged into your Indiegogo account so that your referrals show up under your account.

story:
Short Story
Hello, and welcome to Knights European Bakery. My name is Jim Card, and after 20 years of baking experience, bread has become a passion of mine, It is also a staple in many people's lives.
Knights want's to bring a European style of bread making to Spokane, WA. With it's many different types of breads, I believe it is a truly unique way of baking. Making breads with different types of flours such as Rye, Spelt, and others that are popular in Europe will give us a variety that you cannot find any where else. With the stone deck oven that we will have, Knights will be able to produce our breads with a thick crispy crust and a soft dense center.
Knights will bring the tastes and smells of this style of homemade European breads to the people of the Spokane area. By doing so, we will be fulfilling one of our main goals as a bakery, which is to help people find and taste these great European breads and baked goods.
The people that contribute to this campaign will be helping to bring European breads to Spokane, and my dream of owning a great bakery.      

What We Need & What You Get

The purpose of our campaign is to raise the cash injection for our portion of the money needed to start the bakery. The banks require 20% of the money to come from the owner. To reach this, we need to raise $10,000. dollars. 
The money raised will be used to start the lease on the building and the remodeling process. 
* $1700 to start lease
* $2000 for remodel plans and permits.
* The rest will go for the start of the remodel.
We have some very fun and delicious perks. At each level of donation, you will receive something in return for your very generous contribution. Every thing from free breads and donuts, to classes that you can take to learn how to make baked goods, as well as take some home with you when the class is over. These offerings are just the beginning...
If, by chance, we do not make our goal, the funds will still be used to start the bakery, but on a smaller scale. The hope is that we make it and are able to provide Spokane and the region with a great European bakery.  

The Impact

With this bakery, Knights will be able to bring great food to the people. Baking is an art. This way of baking is something that has been around for generations. To have a passion for baking, you need to love to work with your hands and enjoy the feel of making something that has been passed down from generations of ancestors. These people were the real innovators of their time. They forged a path to what we do today. I find it a joy to keep up the proud tradition of baking by bringing the people of the community that I live and work in the happiness of having fresh and locally made baked goods.
 To make the breads that people really want, the types that they are looking for, with thick crisp crust and the soft dense crumb, this is what makes the passion come out. Being able to make pastries and other baked goods with your hands and putting in the details that bring out the beauty and flavors of the things that I bake is what it is all about. With all of this going into our baking, I hope to make our customers' lives happier and more satisfied. All of this is what leads me to wanting to own and run my own bakery.
There will be a difference between our breads and our competitors. The breads that we make will be of European style. Our dough's will be made from fresh, whole grain ingredients. The dough's will go through a long, natural fermentation process. This will give them a full bodied flavor. The process of a long fermentation lets the dough mature and the gluten develop, which brings out the flavors and texture of the bread. From there we will then form the dough's into their final shapes and give them a full proof. Knights' breads will then be baked in our stone deck oven. This is the type of oven that the bakers of Europe use to produce authentic European breads. 

Risks & Challenges
There will be risks. As with any new business, there is the break in period of the first year or two. Getting everything to flow smoothly and properly can take some time. Having a strong team of people behind you helps to relieve some of the stress and tensions that come from running your on business.
Having experience in the field helps as well. I have been a baker for 20 years. Within that time, I was a bakery manager for a supermarket chain for 17 years. I am well qualified as a baker and have the knowledge to run a bakery. Using the skills that I have learned while doing that job will come in handy everyday to overcome the challenges and hurdles at the bakery.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you may not be able to help with a monetary donation, but you can still help our campaign. Getting the word out to all your friends and family and making a lot of noise about our campaign will be a big help in itself. You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out. 
I would like to say a very big THANK YOU to all of you for your time and devotion to help us achieve our dream. Thank you, from Jim and the family we call Knights European Bakery!

story:
Hello Indiegogo!

Are you a lover of beautiful crystals but wish you had access to bigger pieces? Did your childhood rock hobby turn into a mineral menagerie that you proudly display and want to expand? Does your business carry a selection of crystals, minerals, and stones but you can’t find the diversity or deals you want?

If your answer is yes to any of these questions, the solution is simple; travel the world to the largest rock, gem, and mineral shows where the selection is laid out before you.  Or even better, let us do the legwork for you.


While at the Tucson Gem, Mineral, and Fossil show again, Erica Ziegman had an idea. How could she share the shows of the world with all those people and businesses that aren’t able to drop everything and attend them? Drawing on her 10+ years of experience working with numerous retailers of crystals and minerals, she began to develop the Erathan Emptor concept. After much refinement, we present the business to you and hope together we can launch this revolutionary new way to shop.



How it works

Throughout the year, Erathan Emptor will attend AT LEAST the four world renown gem and mineral shows where she will work with some of the largest miners and vendors to bring you the most awesome pieces at the rockingest prices available. Bringing their products to you LIVE through our custom built website, you will be able to see the show as it unfolds. Erica will post photographs of available products in real time on the website where they will be exhibited for 30 minutes. Anyone registered at Ambassador Level (see website for details) will be able to purchase these amazing specimens from anywhere using their own device (smartphone, laptop, etc.).

Now this isn’t your typical auction site or internet store; if you see a piece you want you’ll need to hit that ‘Buy Now’ button because you’ll not only be competing with the timer and other buyers on site but this is LIVE- so with the people at the show as well. When you do hit that button, you will know exactly what you are spending as the listed price will include shipping to the address you’ve filed into your profile and saved in our system. In most cases, these new treasures will arrive at your home or business in just a few days because they will be shipped from the show within 24 hours of purchase.


The process is the same for our business partners. Registered businesses that have confirmed their wholesale status will be able to purchase the same products the same way. Wholesalers will receive a specified discount off the list price and the products will be winging their way to your store within the day!

Why Indiegogo

To launch a business like this takes a lot of hard work and a fair bit of cash. We’re happy to put in the work because we truly feel this model will take off and let us bring some incredible pieces to great people world-wide, but the cash has presented us with a stumbling block. We chose to use crowd funding to finance the project for one main reason; cost. By avoiding traditional financing, we don’t incur the interest charges that would have to be passed on to our customers. It has been important from the beginning that we keep costs as low as possible not only for our retail customer but for the retailers that are using us as their connection to the shows.


What we need ….. and WHAT YOU GET

This is a completely new concept and there are a few moving parts that have to be in place to make this work. We know this list is pretty daunting and while we would love to have a rich benefactor cover it all for us, we know that’s probably not going to happen.

·  Custom designed website

·  Quality Camera Equipment

·  Laptop with High-speed internet connectivity

·  Travel funds

·  Funds to purchase the products

So we’ve come here and we brought perks!

Please enjoy the Perks on the right of the screen and help us shower you in crystal joy while building our business.

And Remember……

                                           Please Spread the Word

P

S

story:
The Urban Cabin Soap Co. 

Based out of Philadelphia, PA, The Urban Cabin Soap Co. creates handmade vegan soap. My company is based on the foundation of nature, honesty, and passion. Most store-bought soap not only uses unnecessary animal fats to lower cost, but they contain potentially dangerous and drying chemicals. The Urban Cabin Soap Co. focuses on making soap and bath products that are 100% cruelty-free and 100% all-natural. 

What started as a hobby in January of 2014 has grown into an expansive line of soap, beard oil, and bath salts all created from a kitchen in a small apartment in Philadelphia, PA. Since then, UCSC has garnered attention by word-of-mouth, friends, family, Instagram, local shops, craft markets, and pop-up shops. 

[current product line - full list of soaps, beard oil, and bath salts available at urbancabinsoapco.com]

Beginning in June of 2016, I will be donating $1 of each sale to Chenoa Manor - a non-profit animal rescue sanctuary that is home to animals saved from factory farms, animals used in lab experiments, as well as various exotic species.

This campaign is geared toward expanding this fast-growing business into a larger space to increase the production of my soap and to offer you more all-natural skin-care products -  giving you better ingredients  for healthier skin. This campaign is also being put into place to allow me to create a soap-making studio for folks in my community to further their knowledge of handmade products and to teach them how to make their own bars of soap in confidence. 

[craft market set-up in South Philly]

[seasonal spring/summer soap]

What We Need & What You Get

Your support will help me with the following:

Work space: A studio space will give me the room to increase my production for wholesalers and craft fairs, will help me to create new vegan-friendly products, and will provide me with space for the organization of my tools and ingredients, and will give folks in the community a chance to learn a new skill through soap-making. 

Bulk ingredients: These include olive oil, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide aka lye, natural clays (for color), botanicals, almond oil, sunflower oil, and essential oils.

Studio tools and furniture: These include items like drying/curing racks for soap, soap molds, glass jars, new goggles (for working with lye), stick mixers for students, organizational tools, steel tables, and stools for soap classes. 

Packaging material: Not much packaging is needed to give my soap a solid, clean look, but they do need to be presentable. These materials include shrink wrap, paper, and ink.

Promotional material: The video posted above was filmed as a generous donation made possible by a good friend of mine. To further advertise, funds will go towards banners for craft fairs, flyers, and newly designed business cards.

[hand-poured beard oil]

The Impact

Your donations will go beyond just helping me to expand my business - they will go toward spreading the word about all-natural bathing products.

As more folks around the country learn about all-natural products, small companies like UCSC can make it possible for you to feel good about these products. Through transparency and small-batches, the ingredients we use and the attention-to-detail we are allowed are what make the difference. 

Risks & Challenges

The most honest challenge I find for myself is tackling an expansion project such as this. However, with the practice I've had and the support of the people I surround myself with, I believe the hard work will pay off and everyone will be able to enjoy the outcome. 

Other Ways You Can Help

In this day and age, I understand that it may not be possible for you to make a donation, but please take some time to spread the word about this campaign! Social media and word-of-mouth is the key! Tell your friends, family, co-workers, people you love, people you hate, your barber, your grocer, your dog-walker, your neighbor, celebrities on Twitter, your Instagram followers, weird Facebook acquaintances you forgot about - anything helps! 

The more people know about this, the better shot we have at making this a reality for myself, my customers, my future customers, and my future soap-making students!
