story:
1. Join the Movement 

Wouldn't you like to be part of a movement to save lives in 2015? What if we told you that your participation wouldn't save just one life, but 10,000? The goal of our project is to save 10,000 lives by 2020. And our solution is simple. 4,200 square feet of hope. $210,000.



Little Angels of Honduras is a U.S. 501 (c) (3) not for profit organization whose mission is to reduce maternal-infant mortality in the nation of Honduras. It was founded in 2013 after the loss of infant Lily Castro to missionary parents Javier and Katie Castro. In the last year and a half, Little Angels of Honduras has shipped over 5,000 pounds of supplies to hospitals, we have brought 123 U.S. volunteers to the nation, and we have begun both a counseling program for mothers of hospitalized newborns as well as an adolescent pregnancy prevention program. Now, in 2015, we’re ready to go one step further. And we invite YOU to come alongside us. 


2. The Problem 

At the largest public hospital in Honduras, 53% of babies who require hospitalization D I E because of inadequate space.



3. The Solution 

In 2015 Little Angels has the unique opportunity to build a 4,200 square foot addition onto Escuela Hospital in Tegucigalpa, Honduras. This addition will be built immediately above the existing NICU to add space for hospitalization and to increase benefits associated with the Kangaroo Mother Care program. Kangaroo Mother Care is a program that involves the mother directly in the survival and development of her premature infant through one year of corrected age. The addition will provide 50 new beds for infant hospitalization, DOUBLING the hospital’s capacity to treat infants in need of medical intervention.

While in 2014, only 47% of babies who required hospitalization actually received it, our vision for 2016 is that 100% of babies will receive dignified medical care and the ability to lead lives of significance. 



4. The Design 

The addition is divided into three zones. The first zone (shown in pink) is for newborn hospitalization. It includes an area for intermediate care, an area for minimal care, and administrative spaces. The second zone (shown in blue) is for the Kangaroo Mother Care Program. It includes three support spaces for mothers who will be “kangarooing” their inpatient babies for long periods of time. These spaces will provide mothers with a restroom, a place to refrigerate and heat food, and lockers to store their belongings. The second zone also includes the outpatient Kangaroo Mother Care Clinic so that any deviation in the development of low birth weight infants can be monitored and corrected during their first year of life. There is a waiting room with a reception area, a room for collective consult and group education, and three examination rooms for counseling and orientation, physical therapy, and ophthalmology. The third and final zone (shown in yellow) consists of a classroom for the education of neonatal fellows (to compliment Little Angels initiative to open a new neonatology fellowship in January 2016).

As mentioned above, our team estimates this addition to cost $210,000 for construction costs. Little Angels of Honduras plans to finance these costs and oversee the design and construction. A third party will furnish the new addition and the ongoing sustainability of the unit will be provided by Escuela Hospital. In February 2015, a memorandum of understanding was signed with the Directors of Escuela Hospital and they have made consequential provisions in their budget for staffing and medical needs.


We are so close. But we need YOUR help.

We expect an average of 2,000 lives to be saved every year through this facility. If you donate to our 4,200 Feet of Hope campaign, you can be certain that in the next five years, your donation will have influenced 10,000 lives. 


5. Real Lives; Real Stories 

Baby Jose was born premature at 33 weeks gestational age. He requires respiratory support and artificial heat until he is able to gain weight and be able to auto-regulate these functions. He needs hospitalization in an intermediate care unit where he can be located in an incubator and have access to oxygen. But Jose is already 8 days old and space still hasn’t become available to move him into the NICU. He is instead being kept in a small room with multiple other babies awaiting hospitalization. With each hour that passes, Jose’s risk of contracting an infection from the babies around him rises. There is a 53% chance that he will D I E in this room, without ever being able to meet his mother or given the proper chance to fight for his life. 



Senny is a 27 year old from Tegucigalpa, Honduras. Her first child was born on November 9th, 2013. Although her family’s resources are meager, she and her husband anticipated very much the birth of their first child. But Senny’s baby girl was born with an infection. She was taken away from Senny moments after birth. Senny believed that her baby girl was being taken away to receive treatment to make her strong. What she didn’t know was that at the time of Senny’s daughter’s birth, the NICU was over-saturated and there was no space to treat her daughter. The hospital staff instead took her daughter to a small waiting room with seven other babies who were also awaiting hospitalization. While there, Senny’s daughter caught a second, more severe infection from a baby she was placed in a bassinet with. Senny’s daughter DIED five days after birth. Senny never had the opportunity to meet her. 
There are HUNDREDS of women just like Senny every year. They are turned away from hospitals in Honduras with empty arms because of inadequate space for their babies to be treated.



6. Other ways to participate 


Spread awareness about our campaign.

Share our campaign on your social networks, via-email, or in print with colleagues and friends.

Create an event.

Get creative and plan an event at your church, club, school, or workplace to benefit the Little Angels of Honduras. Be sure to share the images of your event with our staff so we can encourage others.

Visit our website. 

On our website you will be able to find out about ways that you can volunteer personally with Little Angels of Honduras. We have many exciting opportunities for service in both the U.S. and Honduras that will gage your sense of adventure and fill you with purpose. Visit www.littleangelsofhonduras.org today!

story:
I want to open a restaurant that I’m sure, there is and won’t be any other like it in Greece.

  Unfortunately our culinary education is left behind, sure we have great traditional dishes such as kokoretsi or dolmadakia and so many others that it would take me day just to remember them. Cooking and eating is all about constant learning and creating; Creating new dishes from nothing or reinventing an old traditional dish and elevating it with adding just one simple ingredient. What I want to do is, try to help Greeks, and whoever is open to it, elevate their (taste) pallet.

  First, of all there will be only seasonal ingredients on the menus; it’s time, I think, to stop eating fruits, vegetables even rich in fat meats; out of season. For god’s mercy tomatoes are not all year around fruit, they are spring to summer fruits and it would be healthier to eat pork pancetta only at winter time; what do we want all that fat during the heat of summer….? 

  Secondly, I want to make my own cured and smoked meats, salami, prosciutto etc. for many reasons, for example lower cost that, in the end of the day will be translated as less spent money for the client and just a bit more profit for the restaurant, also having seen the way of making massive produced foods and also knowing what they put in them, from raw materials to preservatives, I want to offer to people, food with the least chemical food preservatives as possible; it would be great if the generation of my daughter would consume less or none at all food preservatives in their diet.

  Thirdly, I leave in an island worldwide known (Santorini) that means, that during summer in every single corner there is a restaurant or a “food place” but during winter is really hard to find a place to eat REALLY good food and if you’ll find there are not many options, besides fast food restaurants, meaning places with souvlaki there are less than ten “good” restaurants in the whole island, so even the few visitors that came to the island in the winter don’t have many options, that's negative asset in my opinion.

  Fourthly, my general idea of gourmet food or high quality restaurants is not related with the word overpriced or expensive, I will try my restaurant to have as reasonable prices as possible that is the second reason that I want, as many ingredients, as possible to be produced in the restaurant that way, many things will cost ½ or 1/3 of the price from the ones at the store, not to mention, again, the quality.

  For sure every cook wants to stay in history for a dish or because he discovered something new, I would lie if I say that I don’t want to stay in history but I know it’s hard; but in the end of the day I really want to be a cook that served food that it will remembered for what it really is, real value for money, services and food.

  I know that I’m asking for a lot of money but I don’t have any of my own and living in Greece in our day is really hard to get a loan from a bank, to be sincere it’s impossible to get one.

Also you have to take under consideration that you will provide jobs to people, for more than six months and you will give a boost to the general food economy of the island all year arround and not only for the six month period of the summer season.

Sure there will be difficulties. I have to find the location, I have found a few places, but without any money what’s the point of asking any details?
  Then there is the license something not very easy here in Greece. Then there is the production of cured and smoked meats, jams etc.
  All this things have to e produced at least 4 to 6 months before the opening of the restaurant so we’ll have to start working and spending money much time before we start making money, also i know that, many restaurantiers, will be against us, because a restaurant such as this will raise the bar high and those that,  firstly want to make money and then sell REALY GOOD FOOD, will  maybe, see their business drop.
  The last, but in my opinion hardest difficulty, is to convince locals; hoteliers as well as consumer that what we have created is an innovative cuisine (referring always just on the island, and maybe the country but for sure, not the rest of the world) and will make Santorini’s culinary spot on the map even stronger, since it already is a world known gastronomic destination.
  So as you see there are many waves to conquer and mountains to climb, but hopefully with your help, our journey we’ll be successful.


I hope you will help me to raise the money I need and I hope to see you at my restaurant.

If i can make these at home, imagine what I can do at my restaurant...(?)!

story:
Hi Everyone!!,

Thanks for visiting my campaign! My name is Jessica, I host a small regional MMA & Muay Thai event series in Winchester, Virginia called Revolution Fight Series. We host several Muay Thai & Glory rules bouts on every show but, noticed there is no database or agency to report the results to after each event. That got me to thinking, with a little help from our vast community, together, we can create a searchable database open to everyone to list bout results from all over the country!! The database can and will be a great resource to help grow Muay Thai in the United States!

We Can Make It Happen TOGETHER!!!

Creating and maintaining a online searchable database of this magnitude is vital to the continued growth of a sport we all love! It's the next step into the mainstream for us all! My goal for this crowdfunding campaign is $5,000.00 USD. This funding will go toward defraying the cost of initial construction of the database and website. The database will be unique in terms of searchability!! Most databases online only allow you to search via a athlete's name. The MTR database will allow everyone to search by :

  • Name
  • State
  • Region (US will be divided into 6 regions)
  • Age
  • Gender
  • Event
  • Style

The Impact

With multiple search parameters, fighters & coaches researching a potential opponent will be able to locate the information they need and promoters will be able to locate athletes in their region(s) more easily. Promoters will have a readily available resource they can utilize to help make the most even matches possible. That means more opportunity for athletes and promoters that helps the sport grow!! The database will also help sanctioning organizations keep track of the thousands of athletes across the country in one centralized, easy to use location!!

As thanks for your support

I've set up some cool perks for all levels of support for this endeavor from public shout outs to limited edition monogrammed MTR Tshirts, to special MTR Mongkols, to special crystal engraved plaques naming you as a founding contributor to the database.

Please consider donating to our campaign and help us provide a vital resource to grow our Muay Thai community!!

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please share this campaign with all of your family and friends!! Together we can make a positive impact on a sport we all love!!


THANK YOU for considering to donate to this campaign and thank you for your continued love of Muay Thai!!!

Creating and maintaining a online searchable database of this magnitude is vital to the continued growth of a sport we all love! It's the next step into the mainstream for us all! My goal for this crowdfunding campaign is $5,000.00 USD. This funding will go toward defraying the cost of initial construction of the database and website. The database will be unique in terms of searchability!! Most databases online only allow you to search via a athlete's name. The MTR database will allow everyone to search by : 

Name

State
Region (US will be divided into 6 regions)
Age
Gender
Event
Style

The ImpactWith multiple search parameters, fighters & coaches researching a potential opponent will be able to locate the information they need and promoters will be able to locate athletes in their region(s) more easily. Promoters will have a readily available resource they can utilize to help make the most even matches possible. That means more opportunity for athletes and promoters that helps the sport grow!! The database will also help sanctioning organizations keep track of the thousands of athletes across the country in one centralized, easy to use location!!As thanks for your supportI've set up some cool perks for all levels of support for this endeavor from public shout outs to limited edition monogrammed MTR Tshirts, to special MTR Mongkols, to special crystal engraved plaques naming you as a founding contributor to the database.Please consider donating to our campaign and help us provide a vital resource to grow our Muay Thai community!!  Other Ways You Can Help I understand some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please share this campaign with all of your family and friends!! Together we can make a positive impact on a sport we all love!!

THANK YOU for considering to donate to this campaign and thank you for your continued love of Muay Thai!!!

story:
What this is all about

I will supply medical marijuana dispensaries with a complete system for producing their own "medible" chocolate bars infused with a precise amount of active ingredient.

Dispensaries simply pour medicated chocolate into a mold:


And package their creation:

The system enables licensed dispensaries to produce their own single-dose bars and provide consistent, reliable potency for their customers.

The problem of unpredictable potency is solved.

My business, Jennifer Rose Associates, is already supplying artisan confectionery shops with eco-friendly molds and packaging -- and with your help we'll enable dispensaries to bring chocolate bar making in-house -- and provide their customers with a more predictable product. Not too much. Not too little. Just right!

                              

The plan

I'm Paul DeFruscio and I'm excited to share this unique project with you. It can have a huge impact on the medical marijuana industry, helping dispensaries create and deliver better products to their customers. With your help, we'll:

  • Offer a total production and packaging solution for single-dose chocolate bars
  • Provide a turn-key chocolate bar making system for dispensaries that includes the bulk chocolate, the chocolate melting/dispensing equipment, the molds to form the bars, and the packaging to hold them (all our molds and packaging are food-grade, eco-friendly and can be customized with a dispensary's logo plus the active ingredient amount in each bar) 
  • Demonstrate the system to dispensary owners at tradeshows (this in-person approach has proven the best way to reach business owners and decision makers)


Why this project will be successful

I appreciate your interest in contributing to a project poised to improve the lives of people who depend on medical marijuana -- and the ones who supply it. In short, you can expect a good outcome because I'm experienced in the packaging field, my "pour-n-pack" concept is well proven among chocolatiers, and the way the medical marijuana marketplace is exploding, this is simply "right place, right time."

My experience in the packaging industry includes supplying major retailers, developing and implementing new products, and working with people from diverse backgrounds and cultures. My chocolate-bar making and packaging system for marijuana dispensaries is an innovative next step, and funds raised will enable me to tell the story to more dispensary owners! 

Start-up funds raised will also enable me to quickly build a team for reaching out to our dispensary audience.

Because chocolatier shops are now creating artisan chocolate products with ease and full control using our eco-friendly system, transferring this success to medical marijuana dispensaries is a natural.


Be part of a new social direction

Things are changing. We’re really excited to get this project going and look forward to you joining us. We also look forward to getting some tasty perks into your hands.



What’s in it for you

You can be part of something big, at the ground level – and get great perks in the process.

We've created premium chocolate bars for each of the four seasons just for you, in your choice of milk or dark chocolate:

Spring:  Tropical Mix, dark or milk chocolate topped with tropical dried fruit including pineapple, coconut, black raisins, banana chips, and papaya

Summer: S'mores with marshmallow and graham crackers

Fall: Pumpkin Spice/Caramel

Winter: Peppermint

And since we're from New England, we're offering something uniquely New England for large donations: Clambakes, packed fresh and shipped to your door.




Important notes:  Our chocolate bars do not contain any THC/CBD. Food allergen info -- the bars are prepared and packaged in a facility on shared equipment that may contain peanuts, tree nuts, soy, wheat, milk, eggs and FC&C colors. We'll ship your perk in mid September.

Benefits for medical marijuana patients

Your financial backing will enable me to reach out to dispensaries and provide them with a complete chocolate bar solution and a great, reliable edible for customers.

  • The amount of active ingredient and the company's logo can be embossed into the chocolate bar (imprinted by the mold tray)
  • A chocolate bar is easier to consume and is a little easier for people suffering with medical conditions who don’t like smoking and who demand potency consistency.

The world is changing, and funding this project is going to make it a little sweeter place. 


Benefits for marijuana dispensaries

Dispensaries can be their own chocolatiers – adding their own ingredients, controlling medicine dosage, and packaging their creations with eco-friendly, recyclable, customizable packaging. The ability to produce a reliably accurate dosage is huge, and helps a dispensary meet the content and labeling requirements of its state.

As for branding... Medical marijuana is a growth industry. Dispensaries will soon need to brand themselves better. Since my molds can be easily customized with a  logo, dispensaries using my system have a great brand-building tool!  


How your money will be used

Funds raised will be used exclusively to develop our all-in-one chocolate bar making solution for dispensaries, specifically for:

  • Production, packaging, and the start-up tooling needed to expand our current business into the medible chocolate bar supply industry
  • Marketing, including attending trade shows where we will demonstrate the equipment/packaging  system
  • Traveling and presenting to prospective dispensary customers

With your help we will reach dispensaries across the country and be well positioned to reach more as they come on line.


Risks, challenges, rewards

Our biggest risk will be in reaching the many dispensaries located across the country. We believe we have addressed that risk very well by channeling a large part of our outreach effort to industry tradeshows, where we can talk one-on-one with marijuana dispensary owners and managers – and demonstrate our system. Once they try our chocolate-bar making system, they are sold. We are truly excited about the upside potential!


Contribute now and select your perk

The time for this unique idea has come, and you can have a part in its success. Thank you very much for your support!

You can follow our progress in a number of ways:

  • Visit our Facebook page
  • Visit our website
  • Follow us on Twitter
And please share this project with your family and friends. The Indiegogo share tools make sharing easy.

Thank you so much! Your help is greatly appreciated.

story:
Oveedia-- Internet-Based Travel Website and Booking Engine

An Internet booking engine (IBE) is an application which assists the travel and tourism industry support reservations through the Internet. It helps consumers in booking flights, hotels, holiday packages, insurance and other services online. This is a much needed application for the aviation industry, as it has become one of the fastest growing sales channels in the world.

In the early days of American aviation, passengers were very few and the airlines did not fly regularly, as they do at present. Ticket fares were regulated by the Civil Aeronautics Board. All routes, fares and flight schedules were published in the Official Airline Guide and travel agents requested reservations by phone or telefax. As the number of passengers flying annually began to grow, this manual system could not suffice and the airlines looked at upgrading their methods of ticketing.

In 1946, American Airlines was the very first to establish and launch an automated booking system. This was called the Electromechanical Reservisor, which comprised a temporary storage of magnetic drums. The airline’s operators had to do the actual flight searches, as travel agents could not directly access the system.

1953 marked the birth of complex airline reservation systems, when American Airlines launched the SABRE (Semi-Automatic Business Research Environment) reservation system. Next came DATAS by Delta, Apollo by United Airlines and PARS by Trans World Airlines. Eventually these were all replaced by complex Computer reservations systems (CRSs). Originally operated by airlines, CRSs were later extended for the use of travel agents, who could access the systems and make reservations themselves.

In the early 1980's, CRSs were upgraded with more features and the new systems were able to book and sell tickets for multiple Airlines, where the earlier CRSs could handle only one reservation at a time. These newly developed systems were called Global Distribution Systems (GDS). Eventually, airlines divested their direct holdings in GDS companies, with the notable exception of the Asian carriers, who remain owners of the following GDSs: Abacus, Topas, Axess, Infini and Travelsky. In addition, Amadeus has Air France/ KLM, Lufthansa and Iberia as minority shareholders.

Through a GDS, travel agents could easily retrieve the information needed about numerous Airlines, all in one location. They had greater information-searching and booking capabilities.

Yet, passengers themselves still needed a travel agent’s assistance when booking an airline. If any passenger wanted to book a seat, or go through a Schedule, they would have to contact the travel agents. So, the airlines needed a web-based booking system which would allow passengers to directly retrieve information about the air schedules, complete bookings, etc. That is when the Internet Booking Engines (IBEs) were introduced. IBEs are used by nearly every airline at present, to cut off extra expenses and to allow for instant booking and payment.

Oveedia by PURE

Oveedia is being designed to increase bookings and revenues, as a 24/7 sales and marketing tool. Fully customizable, OVEEDIA can be tailored to reflect the brand image of each property in the system. The platform supports and provides guests with a professional and positive first impression of the hotels in the regional hubs. The PURE Hospitality Solutions hotel booking engine is easy to use and navigate. It provides guests with direct, real-time access to a hotel’s website, content, pictures, rates, and availability.

We previously designed an IBE called FROL, but now it´s time to take it to the next level:

  • Using Facebook, Google +, Microsoft, or Linkedin login ID’s as well as customized Login Systems. The platform will be very quick and powerful, and will assist in increasing web registrations.
  • Twitter integration in Support Center Plus. It enables the hotelier to feel the ease and track their customers' comments or Support Queries in the form of Tweets, Respond to those tickets raised with tweets, or have it created as a request for further correspondence.
  • Google Maps integration. 
  • Customer relationship management (CRM) often makes use of social media to build up customer relationships. Some CRM systems integrate social media sites like Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook to track and communicate with customers sharing their opinions and experiences with a company’s products and services.

Programming, Marketing and Continuity

  • We are building a software to manage the database of hotel room inventories or allotments. 
  • Hotel owners will submit their allotment to our database and we will post their inventory online. The end users can book a room and also bundle the room with tours, car rentals, or other amenities.
  • Marketing is crucial. We need a strong campaign to invite hoteliers to upload their hotel inventories to our website. 
  • If we do not raise the required funds for this project, we will raise other funds via private investors.

Central American and The Caribbean Hubs

Once the platform is up and running, we will start a marketing campaign to invite hoteliers in Central America and the Caribbean, to submit their properties

  • According to Tripadvisor there are 2850 lodging places and 2930 vacation rentals in Costa Rica. 
  • Meanwhile Tripadvisor only shows 1100 lodging places and 930 vacation rentals in Panama; 130 lodging places and 5 vacation rentals in Nicaragua; 590 lodging places and 280 vacation rentals in Honduras; 310 lodging places and 60 vacation rentals in El Salvador; 910 lodging places and 170 vacation rentals in Guatemala; 570 lodging places and 400 vacation rentals in Belize; and 970 lodging places and 1930 vacation rentals in the Dominican Republic. 
  • For decades, one of the most important economical activities of Costa Rica has been the tourism. The other countries in the area have had struggles with technology. This is where Oveedia IBE software, installed on the different websites / hubs for Central American and the Caribbean has found a niche. 

Pros and Cons

Like any other project, Oveedia by PURE has its pros and cons

PROS

  • Unique interactive portal with online booking capabilities
  • A place for hoteliers to submit their properties (photos, amenities, in the area) making Oveedia a 24/7 point of sale. 
  • Will provide travelers and patrons the opportunity to intimately view the property prior to their potential reservations
  • We speak Spanish and we know the area very well.
  • In 2007, a development team in Costa Rica became aware that the local industry had no access to a processing and reservation tool. The conclusion of the industry review, confirmed that the majority of Costa Rica’s hotel and service providers in the tourism industry were not using their website to the fullest of its potential.
  • We will generate three source of revenue: 1) Commissions per booking 2) Website Banners 3) Sponsored Ads

CONS

  • Unique concept in the area in countries where technology is not as developed as other areas.
  • New platforms generally take time to garner larger numbers of visitors
  • Remains a unique niche that is very exciting to many; not all

If you like the idea 

There are other ways that you can help. Keep in touch with us, once our website is up and running, upload and share your hotel pictures. You can also share the concept with your friends using the Indiegogo social tools. With your help, we can make Oveedia the Internet’s one stop destination for hotel bookings and experiences from users around the world.

story:
Americans are in agreement: Congress is broken. Today’s politicians have become so corrupted by outside influences – campaign contributors, lobbyists, and special interests – that they can no longer be trusted to act in our best interests. Luckily, there is a solution! By directly voting on legislation, we will retake control of Congress and return power to the people. Here’s how it all works.

Introducing: The Direct Democracy Party

The Direct Democracy Party (DDP) is a brand new non-partisan political party. The DDP will revolutionize the United States government by giving the public the ability to directly vote on legislation. With the help of the DDP website, your congressman will know where the people stand. After the citizens vote, he will carry the majority vote to congress. Your vote will be his vote.

The DDP will compete in congressional elections, running candidates alongside the major parties. However, our candidates don’t take stances on political issues. Their platform is to vote how we vote, to take our stance as their stance. They will not pander to lobbyists, corporations, or campaign contributors. They will make our votes matter again and give us the voice we deserve in Washington.

Party Platform

Any system where representatives can enjoy a 90% incumbency rate, while hitting approval rating lows of 9%, is clearly corrupt. The DDP will eliminate corruption, minimize outside influences, and return ownership of Washington to the people of the United States.

A number of very popular solutions have been proposed, such as campaign finance reform. The problem, however, is that popular support does not translate to congressional action – outside influences are overriding the will of the people. We need a solution that does NOT require congressional approval.

The DDP solution: Our representatives will be explicitly non-partisan. DDP representatives in Congress will vote according to their district’s votes, gathered online. Our representatives will not make our decisions for us – we will make the decisions on every bill presented to Congress.

This plan does not require congressional approval – the DDP plan can be implemented within the existing framework.All we need to do is vote DDP candidates into office.

Many voters don’t have the time or interest to vote on every issue. Accordingly, each voter may choose a single delegate – a trusted friend, family member, or community figure. If a voter does not vote on an issue, the delegate “inherits” the user’s vote. This allows users to be involved at their own comfort level, while ensuring their values are still represented. Delegates have been used to this effect throughout history.

The Future is Now

Direct Democracy has been the inspiration for democratic societies for centuries; however, the sheer mechanics of collecting votes from an entire populace has kept direct democracy out of reach. The internet has provided us an historic opportunity – for the first time, it is actually feasible to collect individual votes regularly.

We no longer have to sit by and watch Washington sell out the American people.

Today, we fight back!

Get Involved

Please support the cause of direct democracy, by becoming a DDP member! Perks are available at a variety of levels, starting at $10.

Share this Indiegogo campaign with your network on:
Facebook
Twitter
Google+

We will also need help developing the campaign. If you have relevant technical or political experience, and would like to apply for an official position, please email your resume to resumes@ourddp.com

About Us

This campaign is being led by two lifetime technologists, alumni of Carnegie Mellon‘s prestigious Computer Science program. With awards in competitive programming, and a combined 20+ years of experience developing, operating, and managing startups, you can trust that we will build a secure and robust voting portal.

Initial Plan of Action

We will initially campaign in just one or two districts. These first districts will be chosen based on where the most DDP supporters are. From there, we will learn, refine, and expand.

Security

Encryption technologies such as RSA and SSL will ensure the website is very secure. Over the last decade, we have seen the rise of online banking, shopping, and even stock market trading with these security features. There’s no reason we can’t vote online as well.

To guarantee the integrity of the system, the public will have the ability to completely audit the voting record. An anonymized public record allows voters to ensure that no votes are tampered with. Additionally, a third-party monitor will take samples to verify that the public’s votes are recorded properly. The monitor will also track our congressman's votes to ensure they are voting with their district.

A Note on Third Parties

58% of Americans believe a third party is necessary. But traditionally, it is difficult for a third party to win an election. Why will we succeed where others have not?

  1. Our platform is specific and unifying. Other parties have traditional party platforms, taking stances on divisive issues. The DDP is non-partisan; by keeping our platform narrow, we appeal to citizens across the political spectrum.

  2. The time is right. Record numbers of Americans are fed up with our current system. Even now, Congress continues to ignore its citizens: negotiating treaties in secret, and supporting arcane cable monopolies.

  3. We are offering real change. A traditional third party does not get much notice for winning a seat in the house, because the party platform is often similar to one of the big two. Bringing the party platform of direct democracy to Washington would be revolutionary! The promise of real change will spark demand for direct democracy across the nation.

Schedule

If this funding campaign is successful, we plan to launch a campaign and release the voting website for the 2016 elections.

This is our rough schedule:

Mid 2015 – Select seat(s) to contest
End 2015 – Select DDP candidate(s)
Early 2016 – Beta DDP website launch
Mid/Late 2016 – Run campaign!

Budget

The goal is $500,000. We’ve set an ambitious goal, because this is an ambitious project. Changing the world isn’t easy.

This is our rough budget:

$100,000 – Application/Website Development
$100,000 – Infrastructure/Systems Security
$50,000 – Business/Legal Development
$80,000 – Apparel/Perks
$20,000 – Indiegogo Fee
$50,000 – Miscellaneous/Unexpected Expenses

Long-term Vision

Congressmen not only vote on legislation, but they draft it. They should be drafting legislation that best serves the public, but the issues important to us are too often pushed aside to write bills pandering to donors, lobbyists, and corporations.

When the DDP puts control of Congress back in our hands, it will be easy to pass legislation for common sense reforms. For example, 80%–90% of Americans already support campaign finance reform, which would reduce outside influences on our congressmen. With the direct democracy framework in place, we will be able to get these popular initiatives passed.

Direct democracy isn’t a replacement for other solutions, like campaign finance reform or congressional term limits. In many cases, it is instead a stepping stone to those solutions.

FAQ

Is your proposal to vote on congressional and presidential elections online?

No. We are proposing to have the public vote directly on legislation and remove the decision making power from our representatives in Washington. The website is used to collect the people’s votes.

How will we convince Congress to let us vote directly on legislation?

We don’t have to - DDP candidates will run in traditional congressional elections. Our candidates run on the platform of direct democracy, pledging to vote with the majority of their district.

Do you have to vote DDP to participate?

Absolutely not! Every eligible voter of a DDP district, regardless of political affiliation, will be granted access to the voting portal.

Bills are often lengthy and hard to understand, how are we supposed to vote if we can’t understand them?

Users will be able to submit briefs related to proposed legislation, summarizing and possibly expressing opinions. Other users can read and rate these briefs, in addition to briefs published by registered political parties.

Won’t delegates become the new power-brokers?

If votes become too concentrated in the hands of a few delegates, we can restrict the consolidation by limiting the maximum number of voters a delegate can represent. This way, the amount of power a delegate controls will be capped.

Do we have to win a majority of seats in Congress to have an impact?

No, if we gain just enough seats to break the majority of either party (which could be as few as a handful), then it pressures one party to work with us, because they won’t be able to pass initiatives unilaterally.

Furthermore, once we gain a few seats and get momentum, existing politicians may decide to run under the DDP banner. Assuming - of course - they renounce their partisan stance and pledge only to vote with their constituency. This would help us to grow much more quickly.

Will it take long to build the software?

Absolutely not. In fact, there are at least 2 projects out there working on open-source solutions already. Most likely we will be able to adapt, and expand, one of those solutions. If necessary, both founders have computer science backgrounds, and can build a complete system from scratch in a reasonable time period.

Why the Buffalo Mascot?

We have adopted the mighty Buffalo as our party mascot, to represent the power of the individual and the wisdom of the herd. Buffalo have great individual strength, but prefer to exist as one among many.

Contribute Today

$0 - Commentator
It doesn't cost anything to get involved in the discussion. Get involved on our subreddit

$1 - Early-Bird Membership (Quantity 100)

$10 – Party Membership
Exclusive access to the alpha release site.

$30 – Silver Party Membership
DDP t-shirt, mug, or baseball cap – your choice. Also includes Party Membership.

$100 – Gold Party Membership
DDP sweatshirt or quality duffle bag. Also includes Party Membership.

$225 – Platinum Party Membership
One of each item we’re offering. Also includes Party Membership.
story_txt:
Americans are in agreement: Congress is broken. Today’s politicians have become so corrupted by outside influences – campaign contributors, lobbyists, and special interests – that they can no longer be trusted to act in our best interests. Luckily, there is a solution! By directly voting on legislation, we will retake control of Congress and return power to the people. Here’s how it all works.
Introducing: The Direct Democracy Party
The Direct Democracy Party (DDP) is a brand new non-partisan political party. The DDP will revolutionize the United States government by giving the public the ability to directly vote on legislation. With the help of the DDP website, your congressman will know where the people stand. After the citizens vote, he will carry the majority vote to congress. Your vote will be his vote.
The DDP will compete in congressional elections, running candidates alongside the major parties. However, our candidates don’t take stances on political issues. Their platform is to vote how we vote, to take our stance as their stance. They will not pander to lobbyists, corporations, or campaign contributors. They will make our votes matter again and give us the voice we deserve in Washington.
Party Platform
Any system where representatives can enjoy a 90% incumbency rate, while hitting approval rating lows of 9%, is clearly corrupt. The DDP will eliminate corruption, minimize outside influences, and return ownership of Washington to the people of the United States.
A number of very popular solutions have been proposed, such as campaign finance reform. The problem, however, is that popular support does not translate to congressional action – outside influences are overriding the will of the people. We need a solution that does NOT require congressional approval.
The DDP solution: Our representatives will be explicitly non-partisan. DDP representatives in Congress will vote according to their district’s votes, gathered online. Our representatives will not make our decisions for us – we will make the decisions on every bill presented to Congress.
This plan does not require congressional approval – the DDP plan can be implemented within the existing framework.All we need to do is vote DDP candidates into office.
Many voters don’t have the time or interest to vote on every issue. Accordingly, each voter may choose a single delegate – a trusted friend, family member, or community figure. If a voter does not vote on an issue, the delegate “inherits” the user’s vote. This allows users to be involved at their own comfort level, while ensuring their values are still represented. Delegates have been used to this effect throughout history.
The Future is Now
Direct Democracy has been the inspiration for democratic societies for centuries; however, the sheer mechanics of collecting votes from an entire populace has kept direct democracy out of reach. The internet has provided us an historic opportunity – for the first time, it is actually feasible to collect individual votes regularly.
We no longer have to sit by and watch Washington sell out the American people.
Today, we fight back!
Get Involved
Please support the cause of direct democracy, by becoming a DDP member! Perks are available at a variety of levels, starting at $10.
Share this Indiegogo campaign with your network on:
Facebook
Twitter
Google+
We will also need help developing the campaign. If you have relevant technical or political experience, and would like to apply for an official position, please email your resume to resumes@ourddp.com
About Us
This campaign is being led by two lifetime technologists, alumni of Carnegie Mellon‘s prestigious Computer Science program. With awards in competitive programming, and a combined 20+ years of experience developing, operating, and managing startups, you can trust that we will build a secure and robust voting portal.
Initial Plan of Action
We will initially campaign in just one or two districts. These first districts will be chosen based on where the most DDP supporters are. From there, we will learn, refine, and expand.
Security
Encryption technologies such as RSA and SSL will ensure the website is very secure. Over the last decade, we have seen the rise of online banking, shopping, and even stock market trading with these security features. There’s no reason we can’t vote online as well.
To guarantee the integrity of the system, the public will have the ability to completely audit the voting record. An anonymized public record allows voters to ensure that no votes are tampered with. Additionally, a third-party monitor will take samples to verify that the public’s votes are recorded properly. The monitor will also track our congressman's votes to ensure they are voting with their district.
A Note on Third Parties
58% of Americans believe a third party is necessary. But traditionally, it is difficult for a third party to win an election. Why will we succeed where others have not?

Our platform is specific and unifying. Other parties have traditional party platforms, taking stances on divisive issues. The DDP is non-partisan; by keeping our platform narrow, we appeal to citizens across the political spectrum.
The time is right. Record numbers of Americans are fed up with our current system. Even now, Congress continues to ignore its citizens: negotiating treaties in secret, and supporting arcane cable monopolies.
We are offering real change. A traditional third party does not get much notice for winning a seat in the house, because the party platform is often similar to one of the big two. Bringing the party platform of direct democracy to Washington would be revolutionary! The promise of real change will spark demand for direct democracy across the nation.

Schedule
If this funding campaign is successful, we plan to launch a campaign and release the voting website for the 2016 elections.
This is our rough schedule:
Mid 2015 – Select seat(s) to contest
End 2015 – Select DDP candidate(s)
Early 2016 – Beta DDP website launch
Mid/Late 2016 – Run campaign!
Budget
The goal is $500,000. We’ve set an ambitious goal, because this is an ambitious project. Changing the world isn’t easy.
This is our rough budget:
$100,000 – Application/Website Development
$100,000 – Infrastructure/Systems Security
$50,000 – Business/Legal Development
$80,000 – Apparel/Perks
$20,000 – Indiegogo Fee
$50,000 – Miscellaneous/Unexpected Expenses
Long-term Vision

When the DDP puts control of Congress back in our hands, it will be easy to pass legislation for common sense reforms. For example, 80%–90% of Americans already support campaign finance reform, which would reduce outside influences on our congressmen. With the direct democracy framework in place, we will be able to get these popular initiatives passed.
Direct democracy isn’t a replacement for other solutions, like campaign finance reform or congressional term limits. In many cases, it is instead a stepping stone to those solutions.

Absolutely not! Every eligible voter of a DDP district, regardless of political affiliation, will be granted access to the voting portal.

Users will be able to submit briefs related to proposed legislation, summarizing and possibly expressing opinions. Other users can read and rate these briefs, in addition to briefs published by registered political parties.

Furthermore, once we gain a few seats and get momentum, existing politicians may decide to run under the DDP banner. Assuming - of course - they renounce their partisan stance and pledge only to vote with their constituency. This would help us to grow much more quickly.

Absolutely not. In fact, there are at least 2 projects out there working on open-source solutions already. Most likely we will be able to adapt, and expand, one of those solutions. If necessary, both founders have computer science backgrounds, and can build a complete system from scratch in a reasonable time period.

story:
A bit about UR bar

Meet Danny Crinson, a former Nightlife Manager for one of the largest hotel casino companies in Las Vegas with 12 years of experience. But most importantly, a normal guy in my late twenties who, with my friends, was always looking for a bar we could hangout in after work and enjoy ourselves. Reasonably priced. Fun. Not a dive bar but not a pretentious cocktail lounge either. A quality beverage in a relaxing environment. And thus, UR bar was born. Drunken bar conversations about what we'd do differently than our work turned into a concept, which turned into a business plan, which began gaining traction. Our dream became something which could realistically happen. I could give our community, our area and members of our industry exactly what we'd always longed for in a bar. And that's where you come in.

UR bar is exactly that, a bar to call your own completely driven by the guest. Everything becomes customizable. Drinks the guest can select (as supported from our already hired bar staff) made from 15 home made syrups which the guest can sample and watch as their dream drink becomes reality (see syrup display below). 

10 craft beer taps, including 2 custom beers created just for UR bar. Recreational games like shuffleboard, Twister, Giant Jenga; the kind of games you want to play with your friends but probably aren't allowed at home. And with this being Vegas, of course we'll have gaming machines, so if you just want to chill after work with a drink and play a little, of course we've got a place for you. Food will be served tapas style so you can make the meal what you want it to be. This means you can truly make every visit unique depending on what you want to make it.  Having a heated game of Jenga so you don't want to have to keep going to the bar? No problem! We have one of the cheapest bottle services in Las Vegas where even the bottle displays a personal message. Perfect to truly bust your friends b*lls. 

Even the bartenders each have their own catchphrase on their uniform. Music, décor and visuals; of course, you can change them too and truly become part of UR bar. And with 20% off 24/7 for locals (and of course our Indiegogo family), this truly becomes UR bar.

Your contributions will allow us to purchase the bar (in a developing area just off the Las Vegas strip), 

It will also allow us to renovate and buy all necessary opening expenses including inventory, uniforms, marketing and operating systems. Thankfully, doing what we do, we have built up a comprehensive contact list, all of whom recognize the potential in this bar and want to offer their help in the way of cost price goods. These include the construction costs, marketing equipment, POS system and uniform production. What your contributions will help us achieve is shown below. As you can see, it is far cheaper than most bars trying to open in Las Vegas.


zz

Even my puppy Wee Man has caught the UR bar fever.....

So there it is. The dream, the future of Vegas nightlife.... and it's within our grasp. So please let us know you a great time, the best night in Vegas you've ever had; whether you're visiting Vegas or one of our hardworking local industry works. We've got the perfect night for you, night after night, with a different experience every time. So please donate..... and we can't wait to see you soon to cheers over a cheeky cocktail. Of course choosing of course, because it's UR night, it's UR bar.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Stephie from the Philippines! I'm currently a scholar  taking up a certificate course in Cookery in a culinary foundation at the first culinary school here in the Philippines. I have always wanted to become a chef but getting to that dream hasn't been easy. At times I even wanted to forego with the idea and take whatever path is laid out for me. But now that I was given a chance to pursue my passion, I finally had the courage to ask for help in reaching my dreams. 



My next step in reaching my dreams: to be trained by the best chefs in the world! This is why I'm planning to engage in a J-1 Internship Program in the United States after my graduation next year and I know that the toughest part in taking that step is the financial aspect. I know my family can't afford this and I know I will have a hard time saving for the required amount of money for the program  This is why I am here seeking for your help.
Each of us have our own dreams in life and mine is to be a world class chef and restaurateur. So if you're in the food and hospitality industry, a chef, a fellow chef in training or if you like food, eating, volunteering or if you're a friend, a colleague, a relative or a stranger and you simply want to help a girl's dream become a reality, please do help fund my internship this year.

Learn more about my story & visit: 
http://wp.me/P2P4Bs-8x

Where Will Your Money Go?

  • J-1 Sponsor's Program Fees: $ 1,750 - 2,500
  • Airfare: *$ 1,500
  • Rent (for the first month or so): $ 700
  • Pocket money: $ 700
  • Others (SEVIS fee, special fee, etc.): *$ 380
  • VISA: *$ 160

The Impact

Asian cuisine is nothing new to the international scene but Filipino cuisine in particular is quite rare. From what I've learned in school, quality Filipino restaurants are hard to find abroad. One of my goals is to share to the world how unique and flavorful Filipino cuisine is. I believe that through my internship not only will I learn about the ins and outs of a real world class kitchen and international cuisine but impart my knowledge about how great Filipino food is as well.

In the future, I plan to start up my own restaurant/bistro/cafè/bar that will definitely be inspired by my experiences during my internship and through out my culinary career. So please help fund my internship and take me a step closer to my dreams. You will definitely help an aspiring chef make her dreams become a reality! 

Risks & Challenges

I believe the biggest challenge in this journey is finding the right host company (hotel/resort/restaurant/etc.) and right J-1 sponsor. I'm very patient with looking at those companies that offer the best that matches with the budget that I have. 

Giving Back

I know it's not easy to dole out money to some stranger you barely know, so here I am doing my part and showing you my gratitude for your help. I am currently a full time/ free lance sign language interpreter. I use Signed Exact English which is not very far from American Sign Language. I have not much to offer but since this is my expertise at the moment I would be very much willing to offer my services. Please do look at my Perks section to see what I have in store for you. The new year just started! Wouldn't it be great to start it with learning a new language? :)

However small or big, I am VERY grateful for your support! Other Ways You Can Help

If you have suggestions on other options I can do, please don't hesitate to message me or check out the links below.

Please, please, please spread the word. Spread the word. Spread the word!!!

Learn more about my story & visit: http://stephie2109.wordpress.com
Check out my Twitter & Instagram accounts: 
https://twitter.com/cheftobestephie
http://instagram.com/cheftobestephie 
(@cheftobestephie / #cheftobestephie)

Thank you so much and may you be blessed as I have been. :)

story:
THE CAMPAIGN

Philippians 4:13 - I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. 

I am proud to announce that Yesterday’s Glam vintage boutique is going mobile.  A few years ago, I set a goal to expand my brand and consumer demographic by way of a custom new mobile truck and with the help of your donations through indiegogo.com, I will be able to finally attain this goal and take Yesterday’s Glam to a new and innovative level of vintage selling.

Yesterday’s Glam has consulted and will be in collaboration with Prestige Food Trucks to build and custom design the mobile boutique. The total cost to build ad custom design the mobile boutique ranges between $40,000 - $65,000. The truck will take three months to complete and will include a fitting room, an accessories compartment,clothing racks, and all the right touches to deliver a personalized shopping experience.  

Prestige Food Trucks is the world’s leading food truck manufacturer that takes pride in their inferior construction designs for long lasting business.  They specialize in manufacturing mobile units for businesses to advertise and sell effectively, and they are known for their fast turn-around time, competitive pricing, and top notch quality. I am confident that the purchase and design of the truck will further establish the boutiques credibility and  grasp the interest of potential consumers.  

Imagine being able to shop rare finds during your lunch break, at a festival, or even while going for a stroll in your neighborhood.  My goal is for this mobile unit to operate as a brick and mortar boutique yet cater to the geographical convenience of various consumers all while retailing gently recycled, affordable, and unique vintage items. I want to provide an exclusive and tangible vintage shopping experience for all, as most of the one-of-a-kind pieces I sell can’t be found in the average clothing store.  

For this mobile boutique to come into fruition, your substantial donations are needed. I am aiming to reach a goal of $65,000 to assist in paying for the mobile truck. Your support towards my fundraising efforts whether big or small will be greatly appreciated, as every cent will count.  However, for those willing to donate significant amounts can take advantage of the following incentives:


Donations $50 and up will receive a free Yesterday’s Glam shirt, 20% off your first purchase at the mobile boutique, and a free give-away.

If you wish to donate more than once during the campaign (totaling $50 or more), in addition to taking advantage of a free shirt, 20% discount, and free give-away, you will receive first-hand updates on the status of the truck along with an exclusive invitation for sneak peak of the mobile boutique before it officially hits the road at Yesterday’s Glams private pre-launch party.


If you wish to receive more detailed information about this campaign or if you are interested in being an investor, please email me at yesterdaysglam@gmail.com .

Your contribution will give this campaign a tremendous boost.  Thanks in advance for your encouragement and support.

 

Sincerely,

Shonel Symister

Founder & Owner of Yesterday’s Glam, LLC


About The Founder & Owner

Shonel Symister was born in Paterson and raised in Clifton New Jersey.  She graduated from Rutgers University with a Bachelors degree in Fine Arts, Concentration in Dance, and was granted the opportunity to travel the nation as a professional dancer immediately afterwards. Just as any professional dancer, Shonel would spend the majority of her days in leotards, tights, and leg warmers. However, contrary to the uniformed look of a dancer, she had a very unique sense of style that she prided herself upon.  She worked retail for major clothing companies in college but found thrifting and vintage shopping for unique finds to fit her style better.  Her love for vintage fashion grew and organically intertwined with her innate passion for the arts and from that emerged the Creative Arts Enthusiast and Fashion Curator behind Yesterday’s Glam. What started out as a hobby in April 2011, transformed into an official business by August 2012 and has been growing nonstop.  Shonel’s great eye for detail and love for anything unique amongst today’s common cycle of carbon copy fashion is what separates Yesterday’s Glam from the other boutiques.  Shonel is a young entrepreneur on the rise to becoming a highly noted and one of a kind vintage buyer and seller in northern New Jersey.
story_txt:
THE CAMPAIGN


Philippians 4:13 - I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. 
I am proud to announce that Yesterday’s Glam vintage boutique is going mobile.  A few years ago, I set a goal to expand my brand and consumer demographic by way of a custom new mobile truck and with the help of your donations through indiegogo.com, I will be able to finally attain this goal and take Yesterday’s Glam to a new and innovative level of vintage selling.
Yesterday’s Glam has consulted and will be in collaboration with Prestige Food Trucks to build and custom design the mobile boutique. The total cost to build ad custom design the mobile boutique ranges between $40,000 - $65,000. The truck will take three months to complete and will include a fitting room, an accessories compartment,clothing racks, and all the right touches to deliver a personalized shopping experience.  
Prestige Food Trucks is the world’s leading food truck manufacturer that takes pride in their inferior construction designs for long lasting business.  They specialize in manufacturing mobile units for businesses to advertise and sell effectively, and they are known for their fast turn-around time, competitive pricing, and top notch quality. I am confident that the purchase and design of the truck will further establish the boutiques credibility and  grasp the interest of potential consumers.  
Imagine being able to shop rare finds during your lunch break, at a festival, or even while going for a stroll in your neighborhood.  My goal is for this mobile unit to operate as a brick and mortar boutique yet cater to the geographical convenience of various consumers all while retailing gently recycled, affordable, and unique vintage items. I want to provide an exclusive and tangible vintage shopping experience for all, as most of the one-of-a-kind pieces I sell can’t be found in the average clothing store.  
For this mobile boutique to come into fruition, your substantial donations are needed. I am aiming to reach a goal of $65,000 to assist in paying for the mobile truck. Your support towards my fundraising efforts whether big or small will be greatly appreciated, as every cent will count.  However, for those willing to donate significant amounts can take advantage of the following incentives:
Donations $50 and up will receive a free Yesterday’s Glam shirt, 20% off your first purchase at the mobile boutique, and a free give-away.
If you wish to donate more than once during the campaign (totaling $50 or more), in addition to taking advantage of a free shirt, 20% discount, and free give-away, you will receive first-hand updates on the status of the truck along with an exclusive invitation for sneak peak of the mobile boutique before it officially hits the road at Yesterday’s Glams private pre-launch party.





If you wish to receive more detailed information about this campaign or if you are interested in being an investor, please email me at yesterdaysglam@gmail.com .
Your contribution will give this campaign a tremendous boost.  Thanks in advance for your encouragement and support.
 
Sincerely,
Shonel Symister
Founder & Owner of Yesterday’s Glam, LLC





About The Founder & Owner




Shonel Symister was born in Paterson and raised in Clifton New Jersey.  She graduated from Rutgers University with a Bachelors degree in Fine Arts, Concentration in Dance, and was granted the opportunity to travel the nation as a professional dancer immediately afterwards. Just as any professional dancer, Shonel would spend the majority of her days in leotards, tights, and leg warmers. However, contrary to the uniformed look of a dancer, she had a very unique sense of style that she prided herself upon.  She worked retail for major clothing companies in college but found thrifting and vintage shopping for unique finds to fit her style better.  Her love for vintage fashion grew and organically intertwined with her innate passion for the arts and from that emerged the Creative Arts Enthusiast and Fashion Curator behind Yesterday’s Glam. What started out as a hobby in April 2011, transformed into an official business by August 2012 and has been growing nonstop.  Shonel’s great eye for detail and love for anything unique amongst today’s common cycle of carbon copy fashion is what separates Yesterday’s Glam from the other boutiques.  Shonel is a young entrepreneur on the rise to becoming a highly noted and one of a kind vintage buyer and seller in northern New Jersey.

story:
Hello my name is Esteban Camejo and I graduated as an Industrial Technician in 1984.  I was part of a team of inventors and developers for more than 10 years, and I have more than 30 years experience in the industrial mechanical market.  For the past 10 years I have been involved in creating and developing several products that have helped disabled persons, pregnant women, and the elderly.

The objective of this campaign is to raise funds to produce GWM Water Systems® equipment.

 Your collaboration and support will help me introduce GWM Water Systems® equipment in the market, and your collaboration and support will help others too, as part of the funds received in this campaign will be donated to organizations that help people with cancer, an orphanage and a center that helps abused women.  Your collaboration and support will be very valuable.

Thank you for your help. God Bless You.

I need $50.000 USD to introduce the GWM Water Systems® product in the market. The funds raised will be used to open an assembly facility and to pay for production of the parts.  I have already done the molds to produce the parts, said molds are ready to be produced.  GWM Water Systems® equipment passed the UL Laboratory test and this product is patented and is a registered mark.  If the funds do not reach my entire goal, the funds received will be used for parts production and part donated.

Everyone can help our campaign, if you cannot help with a contribution, you can help by sharing with all your friends and family.  You can make some noise about our campaign and you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Birth of an Empire

“Irish Empire is the biggest event in Irish history since 1916.”

IrishEmpire.org is the online cub where the 80 million Irish around the world unite. Born and reared in Ireland, our revolutionary website connects the global Irish community.  It’s a multimedia hub where you can belong, discover your roots, and do business. 



Bringing together the Irish Diaspora is an enormous challenge. By backing this Irish movement you help us realize our Celtic dream of building an Irish homeland, worldwide. You don’t have to be born in Ireland to have an Irish heart!

It’s an Irish dream…

Stop wasting time online trying to find yourself! Start sharing your story with people who really get you and know what it means to be Irish. Spread the green gospel. By contributing, you will help us ensure Irish traditions thrive for generations to come.

“We friended up first and then did business together. It grew my Irish-American network 100%”


How Irish Empire serves YOU?


1) BECOME A CITIZEN

  • Personalized Freedom Certificate
  • The Irishness Test
  • Irish TV
  • Leaderboards



2) VOTE – HAVE YOUR SAY

  • Vote daily
  • Social Wheel™
  • Join groups
  • Poll results



3) ROCK THE SHAMROCK!

  • Unique Coat of Arms
  • Him & Her Clothes
  • Accessorize up
  • Fly the Flag



What is Irish Empire

Irish Empire is much more than just a social network. We specialize in the following niches for the global Irish community:

An online home and meeting place for the global Irish diaspora ✔
An Irish-style social network ✔ 
A rich media hub featuring Irish content ✔ 
A place to vote and have your say ✔ 
A store with high-quality Irish clothing and apparel ✔ 


Our Challenge

Every project needs its pioneers and every dream its backers. Irish Empire is a labor of love for our super small team. We want to invite the world in to be a part of our journey. Our goal is to raise $100,000 to safeguard the future of our online homeland for the world's Irish community. Alone we can do so little, but together we can build and connect an Empire. Here's how your vital support builds, sustains and nurtures our grassroots Irish movement:

♧ You provide backing to drive innovation and continuous improvement for our homegrown start-up here in Ireland ✔

♧ You fund the leading edge technology required to serve the 80 million Irish around the world✔

♧ You inspire economic development in Ireland and become a key part of the new wave of Irish influence around the world✔


Supporter Profile

Supporters of the Irish Empire are a unique and spirited clan. Driven by faith and passion, you are the wind beneath our wings. You epitomize foresight, family, friends and fidelity. You might very well check one or all of the following boxes: 

♧  You pay homage to a shared homeland, history and heritage ☑

♧  You take your Irishness with you everywhere you go ☑

♧  You proudly talk about your love and pride for Ireland ☑


✹ If this sounds like you, we'd love to welcome you aboard as soon as possible! ✹


Our Secret Sauce... 

We’ve been in hiding for a year. Yes, we even grew beards. What we mean is that, here in Ireland, we’ve agonized over how to champion the Irish voice around the world. More than just a social network, we found a way to serve the needs of 80 million Irish in the 21st Century. 

We’re now excited to launch Beta 1.


Who is Irish Empire

We're a homegrown high-tech start-up hailing from Ireland. We're headquartered beneath the misty mountain tops and rolling green pastures of Dungarvan, County Waterford. Powered by lush potatoes and Irish rainwater, our dedicated team works around the clock to connect and serve the world's greatest Irish community. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help spread the word. Tell your friends. Really, we need YOU. Every little helps. It's only by word of mouth that we can do this. 
  • Sign up to IrishEmpire.org and start chatting online :-)

story:
Home Grown Cuisine

A tv program that shows how to successfully grow organic vegetables, when to harvest and how to use the produce in great gluten free recipes.

What we need

The show has been accepted  by PBS but they do not help with production costs. We would like to raise enough to complete a full 13-week series. Your help will go directly to the production costs.

Why Home Grown Cuisine is needed

Currently there very few gardening programs that deal with growing vegetables organically - we aim to change that. On the cooking side there are 2+ channels filled with cooking shows but nothing on gluten free cooking. New flours and mixes make being gluten free easier but there are still some tricks to getting great results

One Show at a time

The cost of the full series is expensive, but we are going one show at a time. Every time we raise $6000 we will get another show filmed and uploaded toFoodytv who are currently airing the show


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us get the word out about great garden content and Home Grown Cuisine! If you know likely sponsors point them to our efforts.

Thank you!

story:
Welcome to Discovery Deep!

(Latest Update:  We completed our 12-14 June 2015 dive weekend at Lake George, New York this past weekend with a dive team of eight divers and team members from Virginia, California, New York and Canada.  We collected the video data we needed of the next phase in the project, the digital mapping of the shipwreck, and the production of a video short documenting Mapping the Radeau.)

(Update: Check out this new video we shot of the Radeau on May 16, 2015!  We're already under way and need your support.)

We are a new organization dedicated to raising awareness of the importance of maintaining and understanding our oceans and waterways through new technologies.  Our first project called Mapping the Radeau will combine innovative 3-dimensional mapping software, scuba diving techniques, and photographic surveying along with the deployment of a remotely operated vehicle and virtual reality software to create an interactive tour of the 'Oldest Intact Shipwreck in North America', dating back to 1758.  With your contribution, you’re helping to conserve one of the oldest and most forgotten pieces of American history.  You'll be bringing this piece of history to your computer screen in a way that’s never been seen before!

(Update: Check out this new video we shot of the Radeau on May 16, 2015!  We're already under way and need your support.)

We’re looking to raise $8000 in contributions.  This will enable us to produce the computer-based 3-D map of the wreck, and for our VR team to create a virtual environment so that everyone can virtually tour this historic wreck for decades to come.

Additionally, you’ll help us build Discovery Deep so that we can launch more projects and help bring the wonders of our oceans and waterways to you in innovative new ways!  We've already initiated projects ranging from historic and archeological research to underwater geological investigation to microbial sample collection to shark research!  We're creating a foundation that'll help scientists and historians understand our planet.  We're creating a foundation your children will want to work for.

If you find you can’t contribute even a small amount, we understand.  Still, there’s something you can do to make a difference.  Tell your friends about Discovery Deep, point to our website (www.discoverydeep.com) and our Facebook Page.  Ask them to spread the word, to contribute what they can.

story:
KPFA needs your help today!

Generous listeners like you helped KPFA move into our new building in 1991.

Through the last 24 years there's been a lot of wear and tear in this radio station that we  haven’t always had the money to fix. 

  • Our studio equipment is outdated and in disrepair. 
  • Our offices are tattered and in need of paint, rugs, and chairs. 
Please help us rebuild KPFA and make us stronger.

We are proudly community powered. That means we take no money from big corporate sponsors.

We need your help to continue to speak truth to power.

story:
Please help us continue to run our much needed service

We believe that every young person facing challenges should have easy access to confidential and emotional support to ensure their mental well-being.

Faces in Focus provides free or low cost talking therapies for young people aged 11-25 in Southwark and Lambeth, two of London’s most deprived boroughs. The young people we work with - many suffering from emotional or lower level mental health problems - do not generally meet the current eligibility criteria for NHS talking therapies. They are referred to us from a wide range of sources including GPs, social workers, victim support, refuges, probation officers and leaving care teams.

Those we help have issues such as:

  • Anxiety
  • Depression
  • Eating disorders
  • Self-harm
  • Post-traumatic stress disorder
  • Domestic or other violence (being a victim or witnessing it)
  • Anger management problems
  • Substance abuse
  • Relationship and family breakdown
  • Bullying
  • Gang culture
  • Sexual abuse
  • Compulsion disorder
  • And many others…

The impact

Early-stage preventative psychological interventions have been shown to be very effective. Our timely and supportive interventions help young people to resolve issues and to develop coping mechanisms, increase self-esteem and improve their psychological health and mental well-being. The work we do enables them to develop healthy relationships, to improve their psychological health and to make positive life choices to get their lives back on track (e.g. around education and work) and to achieve their potential.

Why us

We have been based in the heart of the community for over 30 years helping young people who are either referred to us or who just drop in.

We are a very cost-effective organisation and offer exceptional value for money. We have just one paid member of staff supported by over 30 volunteers including more than 20 counsellors delivering many hundreds of counselling sessions for young people every year.

We need you

We want young people to achieve their potential and evidence shows that mental health problems are easier to resolve if recognised early.

Please give generously and spread the word. 

Thank you for your support.

Reg charity no: 1063967

story:
Who are we?

We are a group of 15 students from Temasek Hall, one of the 6 halls of residence of the National University of Singapore (NUS). Our team consist of Akileis, Aralin, Dennis, Ivan, Joey, Jolie, Jovene, Krystal, Mok, Najib, Niki, Pamela, Pei Qing, Samantha, Shaun, Trinh and Zhi Kin. 

What is THoo Kool 4 Skool?

THool Kool 4 Skool (TK4S) is a 5-6 months long Youth Expedition Project supported by the National Youth Council. TK4S was initiated to provide learning opportunities for young adults like ourselves, increase the awareness of their potential to make a difference and hopefully empower them to want to make that difference. Living a comfortable life, we often unknowingly take things for granted, hence TK4S aims to encourage our members to go out of their comfort zone and experience the lives of people that are less fortunate. On top of that, through our project we hope to raise awareness about agricultural sustainability and waste management not only among our members but also the local community,

What are the funds for?

The highlight of TK4S happens towards the end of the project where come May, we embark 15 day expedition in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. 

During this expedition, we will be working closely with Forum Komunikasi daerah Aliran Sungai Gajah Wong (FORSIDAS), an organisation that aims to improve the lives of the villagers residing along the Gajah Wong Basin, as well as University Gadjah Mada (UGM) Environmental Studies Centre. 

At the open space of Gajah Wong Educational Park, we aim to build a butterfly garden to serve as a learning platform for visitors. Apart from that, we will be conducting clean up sessions along critical areas of the Gajah Wong River. Also, we plan to build a waste disposal site for more convenient and efficient waste disposal. To strengthen the banks of the river , we also plan to conduct reforestation efforts.

For all of the above to be possible, we require material such as tree and flower saplings, gardening tools, raw material for the construction of the waste disposal site. Hence, the bulk of the funds will go to purchasing these materials. Due to the lack of awareness and inadequate infrastructure, these villagers suffer from polluted water and poor sanitation. Hence, we implore you to help us make a difference by donating generously to support our cause. With your support, the funds will go a long way to improve the living conditions of these villagers and also ensure the sustainability of our efforts.
