The highlight of TK4S happens towards the end of the project where come May, we embark 15 day expedition in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. 
During this expedition, we will be working closely with Forum Komunikasi daerah Aliran Sungai Gajah Wong (FORSIDAS), an organisation that aims to improve the lives of the villagers residing along the Gajah Wong Basin, as well as University Gadjah Mada (UGM) Environmental Studies Centre. 
At the open space of Gajah Wong Educational Park, we aim to build a butterfly garden to serve as a learning platform for visitors. Apart from that, we will be conducting clean up sessions along critical areas of the Gajah Wong River. Also, we plan to build a waste disposal site for more convenient and efficient waste disposal. To strengthen the banks of the river , we also plan to conduct reforestation efforts.
For all of the above to be possible, we require material such as tree and flower saplings, gardening tools, raw material for the construction of the waste disposal site. Hence, the bulk of the funds will go to purchasing these materials. Due to the lack of awareness and inadequate infrastructure, these villagers suffer from polluted water and poor sanitation. Hence, we implore you to help us make a difference by donating generously to support our cause. With your support, the funds will go a long way to improve the living conditions of these villagers and also ensure the sustainability of our efforts.

story:
Short Summary

Quickpik is an online reseller and soon-to-be online marketplace (flagship brand under Busfun Consulting India Pvt. Ltd.). To provide experiential, memorable and valued online shopping experience to customers and the most preferred choice of market place for vendors.

Quickpik.in is portal that’s built around YOU – the consumer.  It’s a unique portal that knows you and offers you products of your interests like Travel, Sports, Religion, Music, Cooking and Gardening etc. The USP is that the more you use the portal, the more personalized it gets.

Belief that Drives the Model.

The customer naturally leans towards a seller that understands customer-his needs-his choices and a seller who offers greater personalization in buying process. While the current online players offer everything under the sun, they rarely understand or focus on buyers who shop for their personal interests and aspirations.

Not a discount-centric model .

Most customers are willing to pay slight premium for more personalized buying experience-product offerings-support services. “


What We Need & What You Get

Funding Proceeds go towards…

We require funding to the tune of $100,000 for next 6 months and it will be going into Design, Development & Upgradation of our online web portal the edge servers in SEO (Search Engines Optimization), SEM (Search Engines Marketing, SMO (Social Media Optimization), SMM (Social Media Marketing).

Phase                                Funding Required                ROI

Phase  I                                      62 lacs                               2 X in 3.5 years

Phase  II                                    90 lacs                                2 X in 4 years

Phase  III                                   50 lacs                                2 X in 4.5 years

Phase  IV                                 190 lacs                                2 X in 5 years

If we don't reach our entire goal, then fund goes into Quickpik’s Design, Development & Upgradation only.

The Impact

•Dear potential investor, you are on the cusp of history as one of the first investors of Quickpik

•A  company that will revolutionize in online retail

•Investing in online retail that knows “YOU” best

Make it real for people and build trust…

•Experiencial shopping for all customers

•  Better choice of Products & Vendors

•  On time delivery

•  Unmatched customer service

•  Unique deals & offers

Risks & Challenges

1.Intense Competition

1) Expansion  over  time can place  a Significant Strain on our Management, Operational, Financial, and  Other 

  Resources

2) Expansion into New Products, Services, Technologies, and Geographic Regions will  subject us  to Additional

  Business, Legal, Financial, and Competitive Risks

3) We May Experience Significant Fluctuations in Our Operating Results and Growth Rate

4)The Seasonality of Our Business Places Increased Strain on Our Operations

5) Our  Business  can  Suffer  if  we  are  unsuccessful  in  making,  integrating,  and  maintaining  Commercial 

  Agreements, Strategic Alliances, and Other Business Relationships

6)The Loss of Key Senior Management Personnel can Negatively Affect Our Business

7) We can Be harmed by Data Loss or Other Security Breaches

8) We Face Risks Related to System Interruption and Lack of Redundancy

9) Expansion over time can expose us to Significant Inventory Risk

10) We May Not Be Able to Adequately Protect Our Intellectual Property Rights or May Be Accused of Infringing

  Intellectual Property Rights of Third Parties

11) Government Regulation Is Evolving and Unfavorable Changes can Harm Our          Business

12) We Could Be Liable for Fraudulent or Unlawful Activities of Sellers

13) We May Be Subject to Product Liability Claims if People or Property Are Harmed by the Products We Sell

14) We Are Subject to Payments-Related Risks

We look to mitigate through strategy tie-ups & partnerships

1) Advisor- Ecumen Developer

2) Developer- Devak Group

3) 

Corporate lawyer -Amarchand Mangaldas


Other Ways You Can Help

•Dear friends please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign

•  Share this campaign with the share tools on Facebook, Twitter, and even Google+
