story:
Short Summary

Hi everyone I am Alain Keller the owner of Le Chalet,
It took sometime but I am ready to reopen “Le Chalet restaurant” However I will need some help.  I am looking for a loan not charity.  My gold is to raise $100,000.00.  That will be enough to reopen Le Chalet restaurant. Many of you know that if my previous landlord had been reasonable, Le Chalet would still be open for business.  Now, after months of fighting with this landlord, having surgery, and getting my daughter to her senior year in high school, I am ready to focus on re-opening Le Chalet.  I hope that your memories of the warm friendly atmosphere of Le Chalet, not to mention the incredible menu, will allow you to lend a hand in rebuilding Le Chalet.  Please follow this link and help this dream come true. Thank you for being a part of the Le Chalet Family!

Thank you
Alain
PS: contact me for any question you may have.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I anticipate startup costs to equal $200,000.00. It will cover property and equipment purchase. The remaining funds will be covered by me.
  • All who donate will receive food at Le Chalet in return.  Depending on the amount of the donation, you may even receive free food for life!
  • If I can't reach my goal I plan to donate to the Phoenix Children'a Hospital.

The Impact

  • I still have costumers that are waiting for the reopening and performers that can't wait to performed at my venue. 
  • It was a successful restaurant with about 200 review and 4.5 stars on Yelp. The year I closed I would past a million dollar. 
  • If I raise that money it means I made the right choice to keep fighting.

Risks & Challenges

  • The restaurant business is a hard business to be in. You have to be a little crazy. However this concept worked and I believe it will work again.
  • I survived the recession, I survived a bad partnership. Unfortunately I couldn't survive a greedy landlord. I won't make this mistake again.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Anyone that can share my story or can give their time and knowledge will be welcomed.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hi everyone I am Alain Keller the owner of Le Chalet,It took sometime but I am ready to reopen “Le Chalet restaurant” However I will need some help.  I am looking for a loan not charity.  My gold is to raise $100,000.00.  That will be enough to reopen Le Chalet restaurant. Many of you know that if my previous landlord had been reasonable, Le Chalet would still be open for business.  Now, after months of fighting with this landlord, having surgery, and getting my daughter to her senior year in high school, I am ready to focus on re-opening Le Chalet.  I hope that your memories of the warm friendly atmosphere of Le Chalet, not to mention the incredible menu, will allow you to lend a hand in rebuilding Le Chalet.  Please follow this link and help this dream come true. Thank you for being a part of the Le Chalet Family!
Thank youAlainPS: contact me for any question you may have.

What We Need & What You Get

I anticipate startup costs to equal $200,000.00. It will cover property and equipment purchase. The remaining funds will be covered by me.
All who donate will receive food at Le Chalet in return.  Depending on the amount of the donation, you may even receive free food for life!
If I can't reach my goal I plan to donate to the Phoenix Children'a Hospital.


The Impact

I still have costumers that are waiting for the reopening and performers that can't wait to performed at my venue. 
It was a successful restaurant with about 200 review and 4.5 stars on Yelp. The year I closed I would past a million dollar. 
If I raise that money it means I made the right choice to keep fighting.


Risks & Challenges

The restaurant business is a hard business to be in. You have to be a little crazy. However this concept worked and I believe it will work again.
I survived the recession, I survived a bad partnership. Unfortunately I couldn't survive a greedy landlord. I won't make this mistake again.


Other Ways You Can Help

Anyone that can share my story or can give their time and knowledge will be welcomed.
Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you.

story:
Introduction:

I am on a mission to create the largest source for recorded women's voices in the world telling their stories of their bodies and their lives via unaltered images, videos, podcasts, and written pieces covering our shared experiences through birth, aging, cancer, miscarriage, loss, eating disorders, and beyond. Women are so resilient and yet so many of us feel so alone. 24 photographers and videographers in 7 countries  have already joined me and ~200 more have applied!

Become an original donor of the official Non-Profit Organization for A Beautiful Body Project! After 2 years of BETA testing, ABeautifulBodyProject.com already has had 1.6 million visitors from 220 countries/territories and 25,000+ cities and towns around the world, so we know the work is reaching people far and wide across the globe. 

***EVERY SUPPORTER who gives $10 & Above will be permanently named on the new website as original Non-Profit Funders! (you can also give anonymously)***

Do you think mass media warps people's sense of body image by using airbrushing and photoshop to change women's bodies in magazine covers, billboards, and beyond, to make breasts bigger, waists smaller, hide wrinkles and pimples, and create false images of women while often objectifying women? Do you think this negatively impacts young girls' sense of self? 

If you are saying yes to these questions, please read on.

My name is Jade Beall and my work celebrates what many call flaws in women's bodies. It went viral 3 years ago after I posted an unaltered photo of myself with my newborn son. I began photographing women, old and young, mothers and non-mothers, regardless of race, gender, or sexual orientation, simply focusing on women who wanted to see themselves authentically. Ever since I have been hearing from women all over the world how my work is touching their lives but I realized sadly that I can't travel to all these women. By myself, this work will never reach as many as it could!


Three years ago 1000's of you helped me launch the book "The Bodies Of Mothers" which went viral around the world! Check out the video we made back then that has been watched over 4.1 million times across all media channels:


What We Need & What You Get

The current ABEAUTIFULBODYPROJECT.com website has been visited

  • by over 1.6 million unique visitors
  • in 210+ countries and territories
  • and 24,000+ cities and towns around the world since  www.ABeautifulBodyProject.com was launched in May 2013!

Now I am raising funds to:

  • Fund the incorporation of the Non-Profit
  • Hire an editor & assistants to help me expand from 24 regional photographers & videographers in 7 countries who are already on board to at least one in every major city in the world.
  • They will be responsible for curating daily content, communicating with the global photographers, editing the stories, putting stories on the website, and posting it to social media. It's a HUGE amount of work!
  • The more funds I raise, the more people I will hire to bring this incredible platform to life & to reach millions of people around the world.

Rewards Include

  • Getting named as an original donor on the new revamped website coming soon!
  • Limited edition archival-quality signed prints
  • Private photoshoots with me,
  • Framed signed prints
  • Ad-space for like-minded individuals, projects, and companies to gain exposure to the projected-1-million-annual-unique viewers, which is likely to explode in size in the coming months after the launch of the revamped sight! (see website stats above with minimal content being added. We project 1 million unique viewers in the next year)

The Impact

This project has been changing women's lives around the world. I get emails daily from women and girls about the positive impact A Beautiful Project and the book "The Bodies Of Mothers" has had on them! So many women feel alone and unsupported as they deal with their bodies changing, going through pregnancy, post-partum, miscarriages, eating disorders, depression, weight gain, weight loss, cancer, illness, accidents, and A Beautiful Body Project has been a life-line for 10,000's of thousands of women around the world.

Risks & Challenges

I have already come this far on a very tight budget and am surrounded by a talented team of web designers, videographers, photographers, writers, and editors. I guess there is some risk this could completely flop but to be honest, I think the worst risk is maybe the website won't be exactly to your liking, and maybe we won't get a regional photographer in every major city around the world. But I believe in my heart these risks are pretty low given the talent and work ethic of the people around me.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are so many ways you can contribute even if funds are tight at the moment:
  • WORD OF MOUTH!!!!!! Tell your friends and family and co-workers about this amazing project!
  • Post this fundraiser onto your social media pages like Facebook and say why you believe in this project. I can't tell you how much that would mean to me!
  • Share this fundraiser in an email or newsletter to your friends and family!! 
  • Post comments onto THIS fundraiser page which helps this fundraiser rise up Indigogo's pages and get seen by more people. That is HUGE!
  • Even a $1 donation helps because it makes it more likely the fundraiser will move up Indiegogo's pages! The more action on this fundraiser the better! Seriously it makes a difference!!!
  • Send out positive vibes to help us take this to the next level! 

Remember, every contributor who gives $10 or more will be permanently listed on the new website as an original sponsor!

I am blessed to have the most amazing supporters in the entire world! Find me on Facebook and Instagram and find A Beautiful Body Project across social media platforms too to stay involved!!!

Together we are changing the media world!

Thank you, -Jade Beall

story:
Short Summary

Hello friends around the world,

My name is Dustin LaFont from Houma, Louisiana and I would like to introduce you to Front Yard Bikes.

Our Programs:

Front Yard Bikes is a 501(c)3 non-profit that provides community members with cost effective solutions to owning a bike. Our most successful program is Earn-a-Bike. We teach kids ages 6-18 how to fix or rebuild bikes. Through the program, the kids earn the bike of their choosing at a rate of $5 an hour credit. This allows our kids to gain basic mechanic skills and understand the value of their hard work. After fulling the necessary hours, they get to keep their bike free of any charge. Our kids continue to work in our program to earn newer parts for their bikes, repair their bikes, or trade in their old one so they can begin to build a new project bike.

Another program we have is Build-a-Bike. In this program, anyone 18 and up and buy a bike frame for $50 and build it up themselves. There is no added cost or expenses. We provide the tools and the know how to help along the way.

We also sell some of our bikes to people of mixed income. Since all of our bikes are donated, we allow community members to donate cash for high quality bikes from a range of $20-$200. So even a person with restricted income can find a affordable bike. In many cases these bikes are used a forms of transportation for jobs and higher education.

Another program we have is Build-a-Bike. In this program, anyone 18 and up can buy a bike frame for $50 and build it up themselves. There is no added cost or expenses. We provide the tools and the know how to help along the way.

We also sell some of our bikes to people of mixed income. Since all of our bikes are donated, we allow community members to donate cash for high quality bikes from a range of $20-$200. So even a person with restricted income can find a affordable bike. In many cases these bikes are used a forms of transportation for jobs and higher education.

Our Kids:

Our kids come from underserved environments with low income residence. Their is a high volume our theft in our area and bikes are stolen regularly. By providing our services, our kids do not participate in stealing bikes and therefore restrain from other minor theft. Another problem in our community is low job diversity and building bikes at our shop has become a launching platform for future careers. Our kids are hard workers. They are talented, bright shining leaders. They are the future of our community, our city, our state, and even country. They deserve the opportunity to learn, grow, and ride in a safe environment, God willing, we can make that a reality.

Our Greatest Need:

For the last two years our bike shop has used a warehouse with no electricity, no running water, heating or air cooling. We have holes in the roof that are beyond repair but with rent as low as $300 a month, its the best thing we could ask for. We have reached out to many organizations and we hope to have a partnership soon where we can build an ideal shop for our kids. They deserve this and we owe it to them. If you have the means to help us, please do and thank you.

Donation Rewards:

For anyone who donates over $50 we will send you a free FYB t-shirt and bike sticker, so you can be a part of our story.

Any person who donates over $100 will receive a free shirt, bike sticker, and car decal.

Any person who donates over $250 will receive a shirt, bike sticker, car decal, and FYB hoodie.

Anyone who donates $500 dollars, will get all of those things and a personal letter of thank you signed by FYB's famous kids.

Anyone who donates $1000 will receive all those things and a customized bike build by our FYB kids.

How this will impact our Kids:

Your impact on our program will last for years to come. With our current shop, our kids have painted it, built the stands, bike racks and picnic benches. They have invested all their time and effort but it's still in what should be an abandon warehouse. We want to show our kids they really are super stars and we have a building to match it. With your help, you will be inspiring our kids to believe in the impossible and grow a faith much greater than our daily problems.

Challenges with accomplishing this goal:

Our greatest challenge is finding a location for our new building that is near where our kids are currently living. We are invested in the kids in our area so we will continue to fight to stay in our neighborhood but options are limited. The more funding we can gain the more opportunities will be available to us.

Please Share THIS!!!

If you don't have the means to donate, then please share our story on facebook, instagram, and twitter. If you don't do that stuff, then come by our shop and volunteer sometime. Our kids love meeting new people who can inspire them to greatness. Thank you and God bless!

story: My children and I already operate one small consignment store, and we are now expanding to open a second larger location with the potential for higher traffic. We've found the space and are looking for backing to help cover some of the initial costs of rent and utilities, additional staff, and store fixtures and software upgrades to run two locations. We take items on consignment: fashionable clothing, furniture, books, textiles, antiques, vintage, art, jewelry, pottery, and recycle them into the community through our store. In less than a year of operation, our first shop has done well and has more than two hundred consignors, despite its out-of-the-way location in a small town. Our formula for success is straightforward: the community values our service, we curate our collection carefully, and people living in and visiting the Berkshires are environmentally conscious and intelligent about upcycling. My children, ages 14, 12, and 3, and I run the store, and we love our consignors and customers. We really enjoy being in this business and are looking forward to expanding our inventory to include more furniture and household goods in the second store. To build the collection, we're already working with some estate owners who are liquidating. We're excited to share it with you. Thanks for considering joining our team and being part of our green community venture!

story:
Wyldwood Radio is evolving!

And we need YOU to help make it happen

In short:

We here at Wyldwood Radio are launching this Indiegogo campaign to raise funds for new equipment to cover events and festivals. We need your help to make this happen and to greatly improve the radio station and what we can do.

What we need and what you get:

We need equipment to be able to bring you the best quality interviews, images and articles from events you want to hear more about but maybe can’t attend for various reasons. We have had many offers for having a presence at events but have been unable to attend them due to a lack of transport, not the best equipment and the cost of public transport working out too high.

Our biggest hope from this campaign is to be able to raise enough to get what we affectionately refer to as the ‘Wyldwood Wagon’; a suitable car that’s big enough for our equipment, and to carry more than 2 people to events and festivals. It would be amazing to be able to get fully mobile and make the station more professional and interactive with more features.

The other equipment we need is as follows:

A Dictaphone

An SLR camera for stills and video (if possible)

Wyldwood Radio t-shirts for the members of the team so they’re instantly recognisable

Business cards and various stationery

A suitable laptop, dedicated to the station, which will work with our existing mixing desk and microphone.

Insurance for all of the above.

Our biggest hope from this campaign is to be able to raise enough to get what we affectionately refer to as the ‘Wyldwood Wagon’; a suitable car that’s big enough for our equipment, and to carry more than 2 people to events and festivals. It would be amazing to be able to get fully mobile and make the station more professional and interactive with more features.

Along with the car, we will also need a good size and quality tent for staying at events. Depending on the outcome of this fundraiser, we may be able to get a special ‘add-on’ for the tent which adds an awning suitable for meetings, interviews and being in the shade/out of the rain at festivals in the UK and beyond.

The impact:

For Wyldwood Radio, its bands and its listeners, the impact is going to be huge. We will be able to cover the events in the UK and beyond professionally with the correct equipment. We will then be able to edit the interviews and write articles on-the-move and on-site at events and upload them directly to the website and social media. Being able to get to these locations will really boost what we can offer as a station, and allow us to be able to bring many new things to you. Helping us reach our goal will mean you’re part of something amazing and we thank you greatly for it.

Risks and Challenges:

As with anything there are always risks and challenges- whatever we raise will be able to help the business with things we can’t achieve now. Getting the image of the station to be much more professional with Wyldwood Radio t-shirts and business cards will be a wonderful addition.

Other ways you can help:

Thank you for reading about our campaign- if you are not able to pledge today, please do use the variety of Indiegogo’s share functions to let your friends and family know about our campaign. Thank you for your support!

story:
WE ARE HOSTING A CANDLE LIGHT VIGIL AT SAN JOSE STATE UNIVERSITY ON WEDNESDAY 5/6/2015. PLEASE JOIN US TO SHOW SUPPORT!

Here is the link to this event on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/events/665566273548606/

Short Summary

As you might already be aware of the recent catastrophic earthquake of 7.9 M that took place in Nepal causing a massive country-wide panic and leaving thousands of people helpless out on the streets.  The death poll has reached 7000 and is still climbing while thousands are left injured and homeless. In order to aid this calamity; We, Nepali Student Organization at the San Jose State University, have started this campaign. Please share the link with your friends and get this campaign going. A little effort on your part and make an enormous difference in someone's life. Let's do what we can to help Nepal bounce back from this Nightmare. Thank you so much for your time!

What you can do to help

We are hoping to raise close to $5000 in order to provide a decent support for the country that has been devastatingly hit by this disaster. This money will go towards rebuilding the country and helping the victims and their family reach comfort.

The Impact

One of the easiest way to help Nepal at the moment is through donation because we are lacking financial support and proper medication. Through your donation, we plan to contribute to the organizations in Nepal and help better reach their goals in the lowest amount of time possible. 
In the past, we have raised money for the landslide that took place in Sindhupalchok District of Nepal through our neighboring organization known as Nidan Foundation Nepal (https://www.facebook.com/pages/Nidan-Foundation... ). We hope to do the same and make positive impact on the people who are in need of desperate help.

Risks & Challenges

During the last campaign, even though we did raise a decent amount of money, we were not able to reach our goal all the way. This time we have used two different organizations (Nidan Foundation Nepal and Nepali Student Organization) to further our campaign. Since these calamities have hit so close to home we have been more motivated to provide relief to our countrymen who are living this nightmare. 

Other Ways You Can Help

There is no such thing as a small help. Everything counts! You can also simply share the link of this campaign with your friends and everyone you know to help us promote it and reach our goal! 

*You can use the Indiegogo share tools! Make sure you also share it in social networking sites like Facebook, Instagram and Twitter!

story:
MetaMovements' Salsa In The Park is Boston's favorite, most-inclusive, outdoor summer event!

What started as a summer initiative in 2008, dedicated to reducing violence by engaging local youth, MetaMovements' Salsa In The Park (SITP) is now one of the most popular community development events in the city! Our amazing partners every year include BCYF's Blackstone Community Center, BU School of Public Health, SalsaBoston.com and DJ Hernan (bostonsalsero.com)! 

Would you or your business like to partner with us this year?

Each year, it brings together hundreds of people of all ages and backgrounds, to dance, learn, and empower each other under the summer night sky!

This past year, in addition to our traditional location at the Blackstone Community Center courtyard, MetaMovements held Salsa in the Park events in Cambridge, Allston, at the new Lawn on D and even in Martha's Vineyard thanks to sponsors and supporters! We hosted 20 Salsa in the Park outdoor dances between May and October in 2014!

As an added bonus, we were able to provide real fruit-infused water, free of charge, to refill the water bottles of attendees, simultaneously encouraging hydration and reducing our waste...making MetaMovements' Salsa in the Park even more environmentally friendly!

But what makes MetaMovements' Salsa in the Park unique each year is our youth leadership, employment, and career development program as its the most visible outcome of the teen's hard work! 

MetaMovements' Salsa in the Park’s summer youth program provides middle school and high school students with hands-on opportunities to learn valuable leadership skills in areas such as entrepreneurship and event planning; marketing and public relations; teaching and performing; community outreach; fitness and health; problem solving and conflict resolution; financial literacy and fundraising--and more!

The young people produce a series of Salsa In The Park events that, week after week, bring hundreds of people out to enjoy this unique fusion of dance, music, and positive community-oriented messages!

We Need Your Help to Continue Providing Salsa In The Park events in our city!


  1. Each year, attendees have asked us to start Salsa in the Park earlier in the year, to end it later, and to bring Salsa In The Park to new locations in greater Boston.  
  2. Salsa in the Park now attracts as many as 400-650 people--and we are running out of dancing space! We need to purchase more safe, smooth dance flooring, as well as upgrade the speakers to cover more park space for dancing.  
  3. In 2014, Salsa in the Park provided jobs and intensive leadership training for 28 youth, as well as fun dance and music programs for over 200 people outside of regular monday nights.  **In 2014 we doubled our number of youth interns, creating an even more amazing program... In 2015 we hope improve their training experience through providing better supplies and more adult mentors** 
  4. Salsa in the Park is accessible and inclusive, reaching out to and providing services for many groups who may need assistance in participation.  These groups include senior citizens, teens, small children, people who are deaf or living with disabilities.  We want to expand our outreach efforts and services provided to these groups who often face barriers to participation in this type of activity, including adding resources for those who speak other languages.  

You can help us make all of this possible!

Your funding will go directly to these costs so that we can make 2015 the best year ever for MetaMovements' Salsa in the Park!

Will you support Salsa in the Park 2015 with a financial contribution? 

You can receive some special gifts, for yourself or give to someone special, including dance classes, private lessons, and free entry to our training group! 

For business gifts, please note that we can start announcing your business as soon as we receive your flyers/banners/information that you want us to utilize. 

For private lessons, we can start to schedule them soon after your donation is made!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share our campaign to your friends through social networks like Facebook, Twitter & LinkedIn.  

  • Donate your services or goods: Want a great opportunity to advertise your business within a large multi-ethnic, multi-generational crowd of people? We also welcome contributions of services and/or goods!

  • Become a Salsa In The Park volunteer! If you live near the area, join our family and help us make it happen every week.

MetaMovements' “Salsa In The Park” Program is fiscally sponsored by Boston Dance Alliance (BDA), a 501(c)(3) non-profit tax-exempt organization.

MetaMovements is a member organization of BDA. All contributions in support of Salsa In The Park that are sent through BDA here are fully tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. (Please Note:  You must select “MetaMovements Salsa in the Park” from the beneficiary list to do this).  

Contributions directly through this Indiegogo campaign are not tax-deductible.

For more details about the “Salsa In The Park” Project, MetaMovements Dance Company, and Boston Dance Alliance, please visit this page.

story:
What is Slagga Manufacturing LLC?

Slagga Manufacturing is my small, independent firearms company, based in Connecticut. Our Primary focus producing self defense firearms for law enforcement & civilians. We currently are designing and conceptualizing several designs. The current design we are working on is a rechambered VSS Vintorez in 7.62x39.

What We Need

Unfortunately we are not well equipped to produce our designs, This is where we need the community to help out. We aim to keep manufacturing in the US and not outsource our work, to do this we need several machines to produce our products. We are currently looking into a CNC mill and lathe, with these we will be able to create extremely precise parts out of 4140 and stainless steel . For Wooden stocks and accessories we will need a 3 axis wood CNC router. For rapid prototyping and creation of plastic parts we already are working with a Rostock Max V2 3D printer.

The Impact

Each Donation will bring us one step closer to take our designs off the ground.   

Risks & Challenges

Slagga Manufacturing LLC has been a dream of my son and mine for many years, while we have  made airsoft replicas of several firearms in the past, our current designs seem promising. The biggest hurdle we have to face now is funding, the machines, tools and materials we need are very expensive.

Visit us at our website at: SlaggaMFG.com
And on Facebook: Facebook.com/SlaggaMFG

story:
"We are happy to open our homes for tourists; this gives us a sense of pride and dignity knowing that we have something valuable to offer people which makes them want to come", says Myra, who lives in a beautiful rural town in the Philippines.

Research shows that for many years, thousands of communities in different countries have benefited from local tourism initiatives which became a source of livelihood for them.  These local communities have utilised their own homes as tourist accommodations and engaged their guests in cultural activities and nature tours. Travellers have valued their experiences staying with the locals. However, while these communities are ready to receive visitors, they still remain unnoticed even if they are located close to tourist attractions. In order to sustain their tourism initiatives, homestay hosts like Myra require a higher level of tourism marketing and promotions so more visitors can come and help them sustain tourism as a livelihood in their region.

Online booking systems for tourist accommodations have been around for many years. But most of them focus on mainstream tourism, thus curtailing opportunities for locals to maximise the benefits of online promotional and bookings technology.

It's time to innovate.


Our Vision

Community Homestay Tourism Network (CommunityHomestay.org) is a social enterprise that connects guests and hosts of tourist accommodations and cultural tours that are run by social groups and organisations in different countries.   This will be the first online tourism marketplace offering homestay packages that benefit thousands of communities around the world in just a single website.



Our Goal 

Unlike mainstream tourist accommodations, there is currently no single centralised platform for promoting homestay packages.  A homestay package usually includes a minimum of 2 nights’ accommodation for a minimum of 2 guests, meals, and local tours that are initiated by the hosts. 

Our goal is to promote local lifestyle, cultural immersion and social interaction in a way that creates direct socio-economic benefits for the locals. We aim to attract students, young professionals, entrepreneurs and members of social groups as well as couples and families around the world who are interested in sustainable tourism development.

The following images provide a few examples of such communities.





Our strategy: 

Why we need your help

There are 2 stages involved in developing our website. 

Stage 1: With the help of friends, we have created a template-based website that enables hosts to list their community. The website features a few communities in 8 countries.   Our web users can search and view these and then arrange for a booking via email.  We are in the process of enhancing this website. Nonetheless, we acknowledge that the functionality of this template is limited.  We anticipate the need to accommodate more listings that can be easily managed by the community leaders themselves.

Stage 2: To address the gap in our current website, we aim to create a customised website. Firstly, this website will allow unlimited listings and accommodate as many communities who are interested to participate. Secondly, the website shall allow guests to book through a system-generated communication that will lessen the time it takes to confirm availability, exchange information with hosts and finalise payments.

The goal of raising funds through Indiegogo is to enable us to sustain Stage 1 and lead us into Stage 2.  There are 2 ways to support us: you can sign up either as a Member or as a Sponsor (see perk options on the upper right side of this page). 

Generally, CommunityHomestay.org will generate its revenue out of the administration and services fees. But with a combined sponsorships and booking fees, we will be able to afford the following: (1) a team of web developers who will create our customised  website, (2) administration costs, (3) tickets to travel and produce quality photos and videos of homestay communities, (4) Facebook and Google advertisements.

Our initial goal is to raise $25,000 AUD gross funding from Indiegogo.  The net income (ranging from (20% to 50%) will be used to cover costs to upgrade the existing website (Stage 1), as well as to travel to 4 countries, i.e. Bhutan, Nepal, Cambodia and the Philippines.

However, our ultimate goal is to raise $100,000 gross funding, the profit of which will cover running costs to create a new customised website (Stage 2), salaries and wages, and intensified online presence which will enable this online venture to becomes self-sustaining.

Our Impact

Your support is the first step needed to achieve a professional and high quality promotion and online booking service that will raise the reputation of community tourism from the sideline to the forefront of online tourism products and services.

We have identified over 5,000 community-based tourism providers in different countries which have the potential to list with us.  By efficiently promoting these communities in one website, CommunityHomestay.org will be able to generate up to 500K booking units which translates upto $5M annual revenue from booking fees. In time, proceeds will be invested back into communities to sustain and scale up their respective community development programs.  Check out our website (yet a work-in-progress) www.CommunityHomestay.org.

Our Story

We are a Melbourne-based group; each one of us has worked with organisations in different countries. Our visits to communities have created lasting relationships, as well as the desire to contribute to the locals’ social and economic development. In our travels, we reflected how, by focusing on the "front region", tourism development has displaced locals, often alienating them from their own territories. The other side of tourism however is the "back region", which often goes unnoticed. It is a region that provides small scale and low-impact homestay accommodation and tourist activities. Unfortunately, a number of potential community hosts we interacted with have expressed how they lack the capacity to promote their community as a tourist destination. What communities need is a promotional platform which will take community homestay accommodations into a higher level of tourism marketing.

CommunityHomestay.org is founded by Rowee Delgado, who has recently finished a doctorate degree in community-based tourism development at the University of Melbourne.  In August 2014, Rowee brainstormed with Fiona McLauchlan and Janet Enriquez who have the technical and administrative skills needed to develop an online community venture. They sought guidance from Ms. Lindy Joubert, Director of the UNESCO Cultural Village Program and the Vice President of the World Craft Council in the Asia Pacific Region. In January 2015, they engaged Russel and Linda Drowley who have experience in community development work and pastoral care, to join the team. A few communities from Kenya, Bhutan, Cambodia, Thailand, Nepal, Malaysia, Vietnam, and the Philippines serve as pioneers of this global community-based tourism organisation, the Community Homestay Tourism Network. Shortly thereafter, they have obtained support from the Australia New Enterprise Incentive Scheme (NEIS Program) which guided them in the initial stages of business planning and development.





Risks and Challenges

Aside from technical aspects of web development, the creation of an online marketplace considers several precautions in dealing with vulnerable cultural communities as well as in educating tourists.  In engaging communities, we ensure that we work closely with our local partners and NGO consultants in each country.  

In Nepal for example, we are in constant communication with community officers who have redesigned homestay programs in regional communities to cater to the needs of communities after recent earthquakes in the central region.  For them, the devastation is not the end of tourism, rather the beginning of new tourism packages that incorporates volunteerism in communities. 

Our team's collective experiences in local tourism development and operations guarantees the overall success of addressing possible sustainability issues as well as safety concerns. The booking services will be supplemented with pre-trip and post-trip briefings, outlining expectations and levels of satisfaction of both hosts and guests.    Our Terms and Conditions are also available on our website so both hosts and guests are aware of the potentials and benefits of utilising our website services.

story:
We still need your support!

PLEASE VISIT OUR NEW CAMPAIGN:

http://igg.me/at/capitalcatcafe2


Not just another Cat Café...

So by now, just about everyone has heard of Cat Cafés!  Where there are cute cats to cuddle and relax with whilst enjoying a cup of coffee or tea... you get the idea! You probably also have seen a crowdfunding campaign like this one for a Cat Café as most have been set up through the generous support of crowdfunders. So you are probably thinking what makes the Capital Cat Café any different?

Well for starters, the Capital Cat Café cats are not mere felines... They are all Prime Ministers of Australia, Australian Governors General and ground-breaking Australian Federal Parliamentarians!

At the Capital Cat Café you will be able to meet Eddie aka Mr Edmund Barton, Australia’s very first Prime Minister! You will also get to interact with Australia’s first female Prime Minister, Ms Julia Gillard... ok, so not the real Julia Gillard, but our Julia is also an intelligent, ginger-haired leader! They will be joined by many other Kitty-Parliamentarians who are putting litter-wars aside and are forming their own government at the Capital Cat Café and want to take on Parliament House as Canberra’s must-see tourist attraction!

The Capital Cat Café will be completely unique to Canberra and like no other Cat Café in the world! The cafe will be fitted out to reflect the Australian Nation’s Capital and Canberra’s many tourist attractions. The Kitty-Parliamentarians will have their own Prime Minister’s Office and Cabinet Room along with a mini Canberra decked out with all the facilities and equipment a cat could ever want or need!


Who are we?

We are two sisters, animal lovers and now full time crazy cat ladies! We have both worked in the social welfare and community sector for many years and are passionate about helping people and animals! The idea of a starting a Cat Café came from seeing the happiness that our own cat Zanda brought to people’s lives via his social media. Our goal is to make the Capital Cat Café something that Canberra and Australia are proud of. We have been working very hard all year to make the Capital Cat Café a reality. It has not been an easy journey, but we are finally getting there!


What is needed...

The required permits are getting sorted out and we have found the purr-fect premise! What we need now is your help to fit out the premise for both the kitties and human visitors to enjoy. The premise is a brand new, blank canvas so we need to build in absolutely everything, including a full coffee shop and even toilets! Your contributions will go toward:

  • Construction of internal walls/rooms

  • Building toilets

  • Fitting out the kitty-wonderland for the cats

  • Fit out of Coffee Shop/Café and kitchen

  • Completion of our website and online booking system

  • Legal costs

We have set our target goal at $120,000 but we actually need more than this to make the Capital Cat Café purr-fectly amazing! We hoping to totally blow our target to get the Cat Café open as soon as possible!


What you get...

We are soooo thankful for your support and for every single dollar contributed! We have a whole bunch of Perks we hope you will take advantage of!

We think the best Perk is our “Wall of Honour” Perk! Imagine your name and location fur-ever on the walls of the café? That’s right the coffee shop part of the Capital Cat Café will be covered forever with the names of the amazing people that supported us! We would love to have people from all over Canberra, Australia and the rest of the world! And we want you to be part of it!!

Here's what it is going to look something like...


We also have an exclusive offer especially for our Crowdfunders! A Cat Play Date Perk gets you pre-paid entry to visit the cats at a special discounted price!


Cat Welfare is our top priority!

The welfare of the café cats is of the upmost important to us. All the cats will be rescued or rehomed cats that reside permanently in the Cat Café.  We are working hard to find and personally choose cats with the right temperaments and personalities to enjoy and actually thrive in a Cat Café environment. It is important to us to know the cats individually, their needs and their quirks, prior to the Cat Café opening and to do this we are currently building the team of Capital Cat Café cats. Our commitment to our cats is for their life and to be responsible pet owners to each cat we will provide for them for the duration of their lives, even after they may need to be retired from the Cat Café.

The cats will live in kitty-wonderland created just for them.  The Capital Cat Café will be their home. The cats will not be available for adoption, however we will be supporting local animal welfare and rescue groups and doing everything we can to promote animal adoptions and responsible pet ownership.

We are working with a local Vet who is advising us on how to provide the purr-fect environment for the cats. The Vet will visit the cats at least monthly to check on the health and wellbeing of the cats. We are also working with the local Pet Ambulance Service, who be available to rush our cats to emergency treatment should ever the need arise (Hopefully Never!)

We want to make the Capital Cat Café an attraction and place Canberra is proud of! We want to support local business, promote local products and give back to the community as much as we can.


FAQ

How much will it cost to visit the cats?

A 1 hour visit with cats will cost $12 once the Cat Cafe open. Pre-paying your visit via a ‘Cat Play Date’ Perk will ensure you secure the exclusive price of $10 per 1 hour visit.

Can I bring my own cat?

Unfortunately no. This could potentially be distressing for the Cat Café cats as well as your cat.

Will the cats be available for adoption?

No, the Café Cats will be permanent residents of the Capital Cat Café . We will do everything we can to support local rescue and animal welfare groups and will promote and advertise cats available for adoption.  Having cats coming in and out of a multi-cat environment can be unsettling and stressful for some cats. In our experience, cats often take time to adapt to new environments so we believe it to be in the best interests of the cats to have a secure, bonded group.  The individual cats own personalities and needs are most important to us and we want to provide a safe, secure, relaxed and happy environment for our cats to live in.

I have heard other Cat Cafe’s rotate cats in and out of the cat’s area so they don’t become too tired or overwhelmed, will you be doing this?

No, the Capital Cat Café  will be the cats own home. The cats will be able to come and go whenever they please in and out of the rooms in the cat area. They will also have access to their own special room away from visitors. Visitors will not be allowed to disturb or wake a sleeping cat. Qualified staff will monitor the cats and if needed remove a cat if it became distressed. (We will be rotating the humans instead!)

Are you qualified to care for the Cats?

We have been completing specialist courses in feline behaviour and are undertaking further studies in Animal Care. All staff will be trained in animal welfare and will know our cats individually and be able to assess their needs. Furthermore our Vet will attend the Cat Café at least monthly to check on the health and welfare of the cats and we will continue to consult with them in regards to welfare, behaviour and what is needed to provide the purr-fect kitty wonderland.

Cats near food, isn’t that unhygienic?

All food will be prepared in an area away from the cats and staff handling food will not be near the cats. The cats are will be separated from the Café by walls and glass partitions. Visitors will be required to walk through an exclusion zone to enter the cat’s area.  It will be the individual person’s choice if they choose to take their food into the cat area.  Café staff will not serve food in the cat area.

Will there be good coffee?

YESSSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!! The Capital Cat Café will have a full coffee shop with real coffee as well as teas, hot chocolates and lots of other yummy things!

Will you have a cat named Tony Abbott?

No not at this stage... maybe once he retires.

Will you have jobs available?

Yes! All jobs will be advertised on our Facebook page in the first instance so please stay tuned to that!

Are you looking for corporate sponsorships?

Yes! Please contact us via email.

Can I contribute via direct bank transfer or check?

Yes, please contact us to discuss via email or Facebook private message.

I can’t contribute financially, but would still like to help. What can I do?

Please follow us on social media, share this campaign and tell your friends and family about it. The more people that hear about Capital Cat Café the better!

I have another question, how can I ask you?

We are more than happy to answer any questions. We can be contacted via Facebook, Twitter or email. We will endeavour to respond to you as soon as possible, but we receive many questions so please be patient.


Other ways you can contribute...

We are so thankful for all the support and encouragement we have received and we appreciate every dollar contributed to this campaign! If you can’t afford to contribute financially, you can still help by telling your friends and family and sharing this about this campaign via social media and the internet.

Here’s a few ways how you can help:

you can help us out:

LIKE us on Facebook

Follow us on Twitter

Share our link http://igg.me/at/capitalcatcafe with your friends, family and everyone you know!

Write a blog or online article

Comment and tell us your ideas! We want you to be part of this journey with us!

http://igg.me/at/capitalcatcafe2

story:
The “The Devil's Bible” is the brand name of a powerful and practical tool for the development of people, groups and enterprises. It is this and only this. In no case is there any kind of proselytism to any form of known or unknown religion or organization. From the beginning, we declare that we do not constitute any kind of religion or church. No relation do we have with any religious or parareligious organization whatsoever. We are not at all related to paranormal phenomena.  No relation do we have with any worship or admiration of any entity, divine or not. 

We believe and support religious tolerance.


It is the method that offers you the possibility to evolve and optimize your extraordinary abilities though your personal experiences, with special techniques and exercises . It is an innovative way that can lead you to gaining experience and knowledge in an amazing combination.

It is the ultimate practical technology for personal and professional development.

It is a practical method of achieving any goal, having anything or anyone you've ever desired, and by saying this, we truly mean it.

It is about tried and true success methods throughout the centuries.

It is a journey full of discoveries and revelations of the most ancient and well guarded secrets throughout the years.

It is the true and real knowledge of everything around us and their function.

It is the one and only true way towards recognizing and knowing ourselves and achieving anything we long for.

It is the method that will bring direct and permanent results in every aspect of your life that it’s applied on.

It is the only way to believe that your only limit is the sky.

It is made for those who really wish to change their life, improve their life once and for all.

It is the method that will allow you to find what you truly need and discover what is preventing your efforts to find happiness so far.

It is the most profitable investment of your life.


The “The Devil's Bible” is not a novel nor a science fiction book, nor just another self-improvement method.

It’s not a method of envisioning. It’s not another philosophy. It’s not another theoretical method.

It’s not a collection of short stories about how someone succeeded in the past.

We won’t tell you that you’re already rich (like the other methods do, practically calling us ungrateful for not appreciating what we have), we will make you rich.

It has nothing to do with worshiping any real or imaginary being.

It is no kind of religion. 


After the end of the training, you will not believe that you could ever obtain such skills and competences.

You will be able to achieve any goal.

Once armed with self-awareness, patience and persistence, you will find your goals to be not only achievable and realistic but also easily applicable through this infallible practical guide.

You will be able to obtain anything no matter how big or small it is.

You will be able to influence people and situations implicitly and explicitly the way you want.

You will be able to be the leader of every big or small group.

You will be able to create and lead any big or small enterprise.

You will be ready to live the life you've dreamt of and the life you deserve.



Your body is the main medium in order to accomplish everything, it is the most important tool at your disposal and using it you can achieve every goal. You could not exist without it, you live and breathe thanks to it.

The first goal of this method is the awakening of the body and its optimal function.

Some of the contents ...

  • How to keep body and mind healthy and in perfect shape so to benefit the most from it.
  • All the secrets to longevity, how to live up to 100 years and more (as far as the body is concerned).
  • Put an end to obesity, what is the ideal weight for you and how you can manage to reach it and keep it.
  • Build the body of your dreams.
  • Forget all about gyms, there is an innovative and effective way to exercise in only 9 minutes.
  • How to freeze time and stay young forever.
  • How to be champions in bed.
  • How to always have perfect figure, unlimited energy and feel self- confident.
  • The secret to being vigorous and have inexhaustible energy exactly like children.


The next most significant (but also the most underrated) element is nutrition. Unfortunately, the modern lifestyle is not on your side in this battle. We can literally say that “you are what you eat”. Your nutrition is your medication.

Some of the contents ...

  • Which foods provide protection from diseases like Alzheimer’s, Chronic Fatigue Syndrome, depression, Parkinson’s and others.
  • The secret to longevity (as far as nutrition is concerned).
  • The unveiling of the Fruit of Life. Which was the Tree and the Fruit of Life that Adam and Eve tasted and gained eternal life.
  • The unveiling of the Fruit of Life. Which was the Tree and the Fruit of Life that Adam and Eve tasted and gained divine knowledge.
  • The secret to a flat belly is not endless hours of working out.
  • Which herbs bring mental clarity and well-being.
  • Which foods can bring you amazing performance in bed.
  • How through nutrition did primitive people become “intelligent”.
  • What diet did the ancient Olympic medalists follow.
  • Full list of therapeutic herbs, how to use them and which diseases they can cure.
  • List of quick and healthy meals and recipes.


Further information are provided only in upgraded level.



After knowing the essence of ourselves, we can then proceed to self-awareness. Knowing ourselves is the beginning of everything (this sentence may seem exaggerated because self-awareness is very underestimated).

The conquest of happiness is the greatest desire exactly because it constitutes a combination and the capstone of all the rest. The road to happiness is paved with a deeper knowledge of ourselves.

In this section you will learn how not to waste your time underestimating yourself, how to let yourself go and get enchanted by great dreams and how to use the energy of your archetypes in order to express the true purpose of your existence.

Some of the contents ...

  • How can you discover who you really are?
  • Which are the practical techniques for self-observation and self-assessment.
  • Which are the problem-solving techniques and strategies to face hard, difficult situations through self-awareness.
  • Which are the most useful tools you will need going down the path towards self-awareness.

Further information are provided only in upgraded level.

Further information are provided only in upgraded level.


In every challenge we face, either expectedly or unexpectedly, if we are armed with patience and persistence, we can move forward and be the creators of our own world.

With persistence and patience even the turtle defeated the rabbit. The Rabbit and Turtle Modern Race Story

This constitutes a great secret in this day and age. Today, in this fast-paced life, the majority of your opponents may have more skills than you (like the rabbit) but most likely they lack persistence and patience. Therefore, if you master the art of patience and persistence you will have at your disposal one additional powerful weapon against your competitors.


Here we reveal to you the powerful force of habit. Almost everything is a habit. 

In this section you will learn how to give up all your bad habits and replace them with beneficial ones that will help you achieve your goals.

Habit is like being in autopilot mode, as long as you obtain a good habit, you will then be able to follow it without second thoughts and your body will not resist to it.

Having mastered the art of patience and persistence, you will easily access the powerful force of habit.


It is presented here the unlimited and powerful force of command through this method. We are what we think about. If patience and persistence help us achieve our goals, the force of command can do wonders and boost our performance miraculously.

This method is not limited in describing the right and most efficient way of performance as far as powerful commands are concerned, but it also expands, including the most important element: the eradication of all the commands that are harmful for you, either they are created by someone else or by yourself, and they have taken root deep inside you. These commands are like great walls that rise around you or like a ball and chain that keep you down.
We are totally sincere to you when we tell you that the most important thing is to eradicate your inner negative commands that are harming you and keep you away from happiness.

Some of the contents ...

  • How can you start believing in yourself?
  • How can you gain faith in your own goals?
  • How to define what you want and express your goals in a way that will ensure your success.
  • How to use expressions of confidence if you wish to accomplish goal by goal.
  • How to stay focused and true to your purposes.
  • How to understand which commands harm you.
  • How to be able to eradicate them so they will not harm as anymore.
  • How to stay away from facts and situations that harm you.

Many lives have been wasted over false causes. If you do not recognise “Ego”, if you have no “self-awareness” and if you are not familiar with the art of setting the right goals, then it’s possible that you will set goals that are far away from what you really dream of doing in your life. The result is very hard work for something that offers some or even no pleasure in life.

Being self-aware can help you set the right goals in order to make your live more pleasant and easier. 


We can achieve nothing unless we have management, time-management, mind management, life management
The arrangement of your material world can be translated in order in our life. It is only when you start putting everything in the right place that you will be able to focus on more important things in your life.

Time is the next most important element of our existence and that is because to live is not only necessary to our existence, but also imperative in order to have time to live. The time we have in this life is specific. It is useful to understand how to use it so as not to waste it and thus become more efficient and more creative not only in our work but in our personal lives too.

Some of the contents ...

  • How you start your day by organising it on paper first.
  • How to organise your life in a smart and effective way.
  • Small and big secrets in order to have a productive management.
  • How to organise your files so as to find what you want in a limited amount of time.
  • How to manage your time correctly, smartly, and efficiently.
  • Practical guide on how to use your time and what you need to improve.
  • How to set correct criteria to define priorities.
  • How to grow your personal and professional efficiency.


You may wonder what recording might do for you, but you will be truly stunned once you find out the amazing results it can bring to your life.

All the secrets to the forgotten power of recording. What is recording? How is it organized? When does it bring the best results and how can we draw the right conclusions from it?

Recording is like a map filled out by us that direct us towards what direction should we go depending on our goal.

The art of writing was created and kept away from people for centuries because it includes the great power of recording, well hidden.

The art of writing may be everywhere now, but the power of recording isn’t and neither is the art of drawing right conclusions of it.


Here are analysed and applied the benefits of fast reading and comprehension.

Nowadays we live in a fast-paced time, filled with news, e-mails, documents, great amount of information that needs to be comprehended and assessed correctly in a limited period of time. This requires fast reading and correct comprehension skills in order to make wise decisions when we have to and the way we have to. 

Some of the contents ...

  • How to distinguish the significant points of a document.
  • How to read up to 100 pages in limited time.
  • How to organize and peruse great amount of information.
  • Efficient studying method for being successful in exams.

An important characteristic, if not the most important of all, that modern people can develop and evolve if they wish to accomplish miraculous results, is memory. Without memory nothing can be achieved, conquered, organized, managed.
All secrets to enhancing your memory are revealed here. You will enhance your memorization skills as far as names, numbers, dates and lists is concerned and your memory concerning speeches, articles, entire books or even poetry. Especially for those that are involved in gambling, people that learn foreign languages and for those who study for exams, actors and others.

Some of the contents ...

  • How not to forget names, faces and anniversaries.
  • Which are the “smart” foods that will optimize your brain function and boost your performance.
  • Which foods kill your brain.
  • In what way medications, environmental pollution and the unsuitable foods cause irreversible damage to your brain cells.
  • How to have a healthy mind and be protected from Alzheimer’s and other brain disorders.
  • How to learn in less than one day the 50 first digits of pi (π) and impress everyone.
  • Why do smart people make mistakes.


Communication plays a major role in modern age, in team work, in business and sales. Without communication our civilization would be totally different than we know it. Good communication among executives and teams of a business always brings good and efficient results. Good communication skills equals success in sales and perfect personal and professional relations.

Some of the contents ...

  • The secret to right and efficient communication.
  • How can we communicate correctly and enhance our communication skills.
  • Body language, its great importance and how to master it.
  • Hidden and subconscious messages that we can introduce in a conversation.
  • Which are the magic words in order to accomplish successful personal and professional relations.

Drastic practical advice and secrets to beat your opponent in every conflict or dispute.

The ancient arts of rhetoric and dialectic, the communication technique of the ancient Greeks which allowed them, even without giving direct answers and through a series of smart questions , to educe only positive answer from their interlocutor. This is the base of the art or convincing and negotiation.

Some of the contents ...

  • Practical examples, phrases and mechanisms that will help you distract your interlocutor and win everyone over.
  • How to always be right.
  • How to seal deals that benefit you the most.
  • How to override your interlocutor’s objections and make them agree with you.
  • How to be known as the best negotiator no matter the case or the topic
  • How is constant negotiation effectual.

Life is a transaction. The first thing you need to promote is yourself. 
Even people hired as salesmen, need to "sell" themselves to their boss first.

Do you wish to inspire confidence in every social and professional encounter? To make friends easily and create professional relations everywhere you go? Earn the respect or admiration of others for your appearance and confidence? Win over the opposite sex?

Then you need to learn how to sell yourself and in a high price, actually.
Tried techniques for success in life, love and professional career.

Some of the contents ...

The art of influence has its origins deep in the past. Having conquered the arts of communication and negotiation we can now proceed to the art of influence. The art of influence can be exercised either explicitly or implicitly. 
The most interesting of these two is the second, the implicit, secret way of affecting a person or a group. 
It is not just about communication or persuasion, it is something more, it is about influencing someone’s thoughts and decision-making process. 
When this influence is implicit, the recipient believes that the decision is impartially made , without anyone’s influence. 

Almost every significant agreement that has been signed throughout the centuries was at some level or even entirely based on deception.

In almost every battle there were signs of deception and deceit, for example fake army locations or even fake rumours on the number of troops and weapons.

Can you imagine who the winners would be? But of course the ones that could successfully mislead the opponent, using all means.

Blackmail can be expressed in various forms and in all social levels. Stress the source of the majority of the physical and psychological problems modern people face. The lifestyle, the overflow of information, responsibilities, duties, the fast-paced life, bad nutrition, the increasing competition, all these contribute to the increase of anxiety and stress. Most people understand that they are overwhelmed by anxiety, however they believe they are too weak to deal with it, or do not know how to fight it.

This section presents in a way that is comprehensive and accessible to everyone what stress is and in what way it can be manifested in everyday life. Combining theory, activities and exercises and through experience, you will be able to learn yourself and the ones around you better concerning stress and get armed with practical techniques on how to manage and avoid it.


Everyone faces problems in managing difficult situations, negative thoughts and personal issues from time to time. The interaction of all these stressful factors increases the chance of manifesting angry behaviour and aggressiveness. Although anger is a perfectly normal and universal feeling, for some people anger is the prevailing sentiment in their lives, they find themselves unable to control it and this affects their relations with others (personally and professionally).

Some of the contents ...

  • What are the deeper causes of anger.
  • How not to get angry.
  • When should we get angry or show our anger.
  • How to hide our anger and calm ourselves down afterwards.
  • How to make others get angry.
  • Myths and facts around anger.


It is the most primitive sentiment that is observed in every living being. The sentiment of fear is maybe one of the most misunderstood  feelings that is often considered to be a sign of weakness and insecurity. But is it really?

Who am I? What do I know? What am I capable of? How much am I worth? How do others see me? Whoever answers these questions positively, is strong and confident.
Self-confidence is an important  tool for a great personal and professional life but also for physical and psychological health. It is not about something random or something that was handed over to some lucky ones...You have to built it, earn it and keep it day by day through simple, everyday things.
Self-confidence is a characteristic that adds drive, extroversion, bedazzlement and generally everything that, once detected, impresses people. Many people believe that they have no self-confidence and feel miserable because of it.
The boost of self-confidence never stops and should be an everyday goal, because it constitutes a constant need: the love for yourself!
Self-confidence is the deeper belief in yourself, belief in your strength and capacities. The opinion you have on this subject influences dramatically the way others see and treat you.
So, believe in yourself, think highly of you and the others will do the same!

Virtual simulation of stock market exchanges and portfolio management.

It can function with real prices from any stock market or virtual prices and stocks of your choice.

This application will provide real data for many stocks, for example opening price, closing price and an amount of data of at least five years. These prices will be daily.

By pressing “play” the participants will be able to see all stocks or just the ones that their interested in on the speed that they've chosen (varies from seconds to minutes) for the exact period of time they desire e.g. 01.01.2013.

The participants will be called to engage in stock transactions with ultimate goal the highest (virtual) profit.

This way the participants are provided the opportunity to understand the rules of the market and see what would have happened if they had truly made this transactions in the past.

In a totally virtual environment (when data is random and do not correspond to real stocks) you will be able to define the changes and the range of changes of the stocks. For example, you would be able to define the rate of stock price change for a week or a month and the price of the stocks would not increase(+) or decrease (-) beyond the defined rate (this rate could be 3% or 13% or anything you want).

This application will give you the opportunity to manage a real portfolio of equities in a simple and comprehensible way. You will be able to observe your stocks, assess your profits and losses according to today’s prices and according to other specific prices.

In the future the application will be able to automatically “download” the stock prices in order to provide you with the possibility of a direct portfolio assessment.

We all are forced from time to time to find excuses to cover or conceal some of our actions. Sometimes, though, problems come up.

We have to find a convincing excuse in a short period of time.

We have to remember what excuse we gave and to whom (if we engage in this “game” often is possible to be confused and expose ourselves irreversibly).

This application will have more than a thousand excuses ready for you, divided in categories and you will be able to find quickly the right one.

You can register in the application (though pc, tablet, smartphone) the person and the excuse you gave them and automatically date and time are added. You can also put in the reaction of this person to the excuse quickly though multiple choice option or by describing it yourself. This way in the future you will know which “excuse” you used, to whom and the reaction you received.

The application will also provide description of the scenario of the excuse...

e.g. You are out with friends (or anyone else...) but you have said to your partner that you are very busy at the office and stuck at exhausting meetings. A while before you return home this application will remind you to check everything that may give you away, as well as if you need to have something with you, what your appearance or your mood should be so to be more believable.

The application will in the future provide users with artificial phone calls at specific time and day, fake texts, fake e-mails with “realistic” content depending on the situation˙ you can choose  from a variety of artificial “professional” e-mails or compose your own. 

These e-mails will be also sent by “realistic” domain names  like www.millionairesclub.com  www.business.cender www.profesionals.guru  www.mytv.media  www.helth.clinic www.top-managers.ceo and others.

The access to the application will require password and all the information are ciphered***.

Innovative application of absolute data security

The file to be saved “breaks down” in three different bit files and it is saved in three different servers located in three different continents with the exact location being kept a secret, since the existence of these servers is known to only two people in the world (people that work with those servers do not know that they work for a data retention company).

It is designed in a way that even if a file ends up in the wrong hands, the access to its content will be impossible.

This way even if the file is delivered after the order of the public prosecutor of a country, this file will not be readable because it will just be a 0-1 sequence with no meaning.

Even if a file is stolen from a server, it would be totally useless because in order for the file to be readable the two other files are required and these files would be saved in different servers in different unknown continents.

Some features of the application:

  • Recovery only via e-mail that you confirm.
  • Notification via e-mail of every activity of your files.
  • All-out destruction of the files on a specific date or via e-mail notification or in case you do not reply to an automatic e-mail which will be sent  as frequent as you determine.
  • When starting your subscription, you will receive a full contract which guarantees that these files will not be used for any other purpose but strictly for retention.
  • This application will be able to connect and function automatically with all the aforementioned applications, providing you with the best concealment and safety of your data.

  • The pieces of the jigsaw puzzle can be adjusted to be from 12 to 108.

A program that will give you the opportunity to test your IQ whenever you like, having also the ability to record your performance.

A magnificent game for you to practice your persistence and patience. This game may be simple, but it is also addictive, with many levels of difficulty.

 

* All applications run on pc, laptop, tablet and smartphones

** ATTENTION

In all aforementioned cases but especially as far as the website is concerned, subscribers will connect to servers using domain names irrelevant to the main websites.

E.g. let’s assume that the website thedevilsbible.com is the homepage of the website. Once you become subscribers you do not enter in this website but in a website where the domain name will be irrelevant, e.g. www.glm.com or www.123xyz.org or www.NewBiz.com  etc.

This way, no one will be able to relate the name of the website with its content.

Even for the same application for groups of users (e.g. groups of 100) the name will be different.

The user may also have the possibility to choose domain name.



In some thematic sections there is no product order code, how can I order them?

The thematic sections that have no product order code are included exclusively in the whole package ( "All thematic sections (33)" )  and cannot be acquired otherwise. These thematic sections are as powerful as weapons and cannot be distributed separately, because only when combined with the other thematic sections, can they be used safely and have the desired results.


Is this method suitable for everyone?

NO, this method is not for everyone, it is given as a package deal here only for a few days. 

This is why there will be a questionnaire in the official website  thedevilsbible.com though which the candidate “clients” will be assessed and they may not be admitted. The ones that are denied admission will not have the right to “purchase” this method or have access to this “training”.  

Please refer to section “ And then, what?”


And then, what?

The “training” is only the beginning. The true goal is the creation of a new innovative and original, universal network community with people that present the same characteristics (not racial), possibilities and capacities (not physical) on a common, democratic base of values that all members would share. This is why in the original website there is a questionnaire that will help us assess the “clients”. The ones that will be considered to be “inadmissible” do not have the right to “purchase” and have access to the “training” of this method.

This method is basically a preparation in order to be able to speak the same language, share knowledge and comprehend and understand common concepts.

This community will not be governed by one leader, but it will function democratically.

One of the goals of the community is to build not only local but also internet businesses and companies.

The support of these companies will be shown through advice and experience provided by the members of the community and the purchase of products of these very members.

Another goal could be the creation of an internet bank like "PayPal" so that the companies owned by members of the community but also the members themselves are not taxed for their transactions or are able to take out interest-free loans.

Also we aim to the purchase of fields and agricultural real estate and the production of agricultural eco-products (by members of the community), therefore we will control what we consume.

We also have as target the purchase of areas rich in fresh water so we would know what we drink.

The creation of data storage places that will belong to the community in order to know where our data is safely saved (the employees there will be members of the community) or even the development of our own web search engine is another important goal.

All the great miracles were achieved by groups, come with us to make our own group or community. This community will be the first in history presenting these characteristics. Come with us, let’s all join our forces to commence a revolution and build our own world.

All together we can achieve our purpose.


In the last offer you mentioned, the offer that includes all sections, you stated that I can be founder member. Did you mean founder member of the website?

NO, we mean founder member of the community that will be created and will be named after voting with the participation of all members. We have to remind you at this point that this is the first web community in the history of the world that is created based on development and entrepreneurship.

We assume that the name will be related to a new universal web community.

Our suggestions are “Global Web Society” (GWS) or “Wide Web World” (WWW)  or something like that.

To conclude, your card will be uniquely and impressively designed and only founder members will have it, with a unique authorization number.
